dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An almost barren tree. Not many leaves left. Snow all around, and a light snow falls as well. Watching this tree from inside a cottage is PAKHI. She's in her early twenties and pretty, but her eyes make her look much older. The wind picks up and a leaf breaks off the tree. It starts to float towards the ground. Pakhi watches the falling leaf, all the way till it hits the snow-covered ground. Overlap the soft sound of drums and woman ululating. Slowly, a title fades in on screen:

dialogues.speaker: BASED ON O.HENRY'S "THE LAST LEAF"
dialogues.text: The title fades out. The leaf disappears into the snow. The drums get louder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON a light bulb, unlit. On this visual, a title:

dialogues.speaker: "MANIKPUR. BENGAL. 1953"
dialogues.text: Behind the bulb is the courtyard of a grand haveli. Durga pooja in progress. Woman ululate and men play the drums. A decorated statue of Durga looms over everyone. Standing amongst many people in front of the statue, dressed in finery, is Pakhi, the same age but looking years younger. Next to her stands a very dignified middle aged man. SOUMITRA ROYCHOWDHURY, the Zamindar of the haveli. The drums beat on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On a makeshift stage in the centre of the courtyard, a jatra is being performed. Loud actors appear from the middle of the crowd, walking dramatically on stage. The audience claps, whistles and cheers. Pakhi sits in the crowd with DEVYANI, her friend. Like everyone else, they have wide smiles on their faces, fascinated by the play.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 2 She looks across the stage and sees the Zamindar, sitting with his estate manager MAJUMDAR. They're in deep conversation.

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Thodi savdhaani baratne mein aap hi ka faayda hai... kanoon kabhi bhi lagoo ho sakta hai...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Apni viraasat hum nahin bechenge Majumdar...

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Nahin bechna hai to trust bana leejiye... uss mein bhi waqt lagta hai. Baki sab zamindar babu log bhi yahi kar rahe hain... The Zamindar ignores him. Another loud actor enters the stage dramatically, delivering a line. Pakhi and Devyani laugh aloud. Pakhi's laugh turns into a bout of coughing, soft at firs but gradually becoming more persistent. Devyani doesn't notice at first but then she does. The Zamindar also notices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar and Devyani hurriedly help Pakhi through a corridor. She's breathing with a lot of difficulty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They carry her into her room and place her on an armchair A MAID follows them in.

dialogues.speaker: MAID
dialogues.text: Kya hua?

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Dr. Guha ko bulvaiye...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The jatra is still on. DR. GUHA, a balding middle aged man, walks past it and into the haveli.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guha walks up the staircase and finds the Zamindar waitin for him.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 3 They walk together.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Apni Pakhi ko baar baar iss haalat mein hum dekh nahin sakte Guha...

dialogues.speaker: DR. GUHA
dialogues.text: Dama hai Zamindar Babu... Jaanleva tab hoga jab hum bagal mein na ho...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Guha enters and goes straight to Pakhi. He opens his bag and a syringe and vial emerge. The zamindar, Devyani and the maid watch as the doctor fills the syringe, takes Pakhi's arm and injects it. Very gradually, Pakhi's breathing comes back to normal. She reaches out a hand in the direction of the Zamindar. He comes over to her and takes it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi sleeps, still wearing her durga pooja clothes. It's silent now. The celebration is over. The Zamindar watches her sleep, fanning her at the same time, lost. He then notices her smiling.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Pakhi? Her smile disappears.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Pakhi bete... She opens her eyes, smiles again. She sits up, still a little breathless.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kahan kho gaye the?

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Tum kab se uthi hui ho?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mujhe uthe to dus minute ho gaye... lekin aap to aise ek tak dekhe ja rahe the... haath bhi, aise... She imitates him holding the fan.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 4

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Pankha jhal raha tha... buth ki tarah... The Zamindar smiles.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Abhi kaisa lag raha hai...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (imitates him) Achcha lag raha hai... The Zamindar hits her arm with the fan. Pakhi makes a face.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: (concerned) Laga kya? She looks at him and smiles again.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Maine tumhe kabhi bheel raja ki kahani sunayi hai? Pakhi shakes her head.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Bahut pahle bheelon ka ek raja hota tha... bahut taakatvar... koi usse maar nahin sakta tha. Sab darrte the usse... sainkdon baar angrezon ne inke jungalon mein dhava bola, usse hazaaron teer maare, talwaar se kaata lekin vah marre hi na... phir unko pata chala ki iss bheel raja ne apni jaan ek tote mein rakh chhodi hai... ab lakhon tote jungle mein, kaise dhoonde iski jaan kiss tote mein hai? To unhone ek jasoos bheja. Ek sundar sa jasoos... bheel uske pyaar mein padh gaya aur shaadi kar li...ek din uss jasoos ne bhaanp liya ki kiss tote mein bheel raja ne apni jaan daal rakhi hai... phir aav dekha na taav, yoon pakda tote ko aur... (twists the neck)

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Phir?

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Phir vah marr gaya... Pakhi looks at him.  10 11 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 5

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Beta mera tota aap ho... aur aap ko agar kuch ho gaya na, to main marr jaoonga... They look at each other. She leans forward and embraces him. Music...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The courtyard, now empty. The Zamindar and Pakhi stand on a balcony. He points out. Their POV: the light bulb is lit.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Manikpur mein bhi bijli aa gayee...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aur rukegi kab tak? He looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Matlab? She smiles. Music builds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun rises over green fields, date palms and red earth TITLE SEQUENCE BEGINS, with title cards on black intercut with visuals: - Pakhi and the Zamindar take a walk through the fields. - The women stand on a balcony of the haveli, watching the Durga Statue being taken away with much fanfare. All the OLDER WOMEN have tears rolling down their faces. Pakhi and Devyani try not to laugh. - Rain falls. Pakhi, in her room, sits by a window and writes in her notebook. - Pakhi and Devyani stand on the terrace of the haveli in the rain, watching grey clouds roll in, standing close together to battle the strong breeze. - The sun shines again.  12 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 6 Pakhi and her father take a walk through the fields. They stand by the car and watch the setting sun under a crimson sky. MAIN TITLES END.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A motorcycle chugs it way down a rural road. Driving it is a young man. VARUN SHRIVASTAV. Coming down the other end and taking up most of the road is the Zamindar's car. Inside the car: Pakhi drives. The DRIVER sits next to her, very nervous. Devyani sits in the back, on the edge of her seat.

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER
dialogues.text: Sadak ka baanya taraf pakad kar chaliye... dheema chaliye... bhida gaya to samasya ho jaayegi... Pakhi looks at him, glee on her face.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Bhida gaya to aapne bhidaaya, nahin bhida to hum chala rahe the...

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER
dialogues.text: Arre dekh ke... naukri se barkhast karvaayengi humko... Varun slows down his motorcycle, looking at a lane going off. He speeds up again, reaches into his shirt and takes out a small note. He reads it as he drives. As Pakhi rounds a curve, she swings the car from side to side. Devyani gets thrown around the back seat. The driver hangs on for dear life. Pakhi laughs. She doesn't notice Varun's motorcycle approaching. And Varun doesn't see the car approaching, swaying from side to side, till it's pretty close. The driver notices Varun.

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER
dialogues.text: (pointing) Pakhi Di... Pakhi sees Varun and she screams. In panic, she lets go of the steering wheel.  13 14 15 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 7 The car veers towards Varun, who has no option but to take evasive action... and fly into a ditch. Pakhi hits the brakes. The car screeches to a stop. They all look back. Varun is nowhere to be seen.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kahan gaya?

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER
dialogues.text: Yamraaj ke dvaare gaya aur kahan jaayega... Devyani looks at Pakhi.

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Gaadi ke neeche? Pakhi opens the door.

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Paapad ban gaya hoga usska aur kya...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi, Devyani and the driver stand by the ditch. Pakhi's POV: Varun, unconscious, bleeding from his forehead. Very still. As they watch, he moves, very slightly. Pakhi and Devyani breathe massive sighs of relief. Pakhi looks at him, for a few seconds longer than necessa as he opens his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The car drives by. The driver drives. Varun sits in the front seat, holding a handkerchief over the bleeding wound above his eye.

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER
dialogues.text: Galti hamaari thi bhaiya... hum hi bhidaaye. Didi to bas handle thaame thi... Pakhi sits at the back, watching the back of Varun's head

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Guha examines the wound above Varun's eye. In the outer room, Pakhi and Devyani watch through the crack in the door.  16 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 8 Pakhi observes Varun for a while. She then comes to his jacket lying on a table, starts to look through it.

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Tum kya kar rahi ho?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Shhhbh.... Pakhi removes an envelope from inside the jacket pocket. It bears the stamp of the Archaeological Survey of India and is addressed to Zamindar Roy Chowdhury. Pakhi smiles.

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Doctor chacha aa rahe hain... Pakhi hurriedly puts the letter back. Dr Guha steps out.

dialogues.speaker: DR. GUHA
dialogues.text: Bete aap log ghar jaao... usse kuch nahin hua hai, theek ho jaayega... Pakhi nods. Dr Guha returns to the chamber and shuts the door. Pakhi's eyes meet Varun's as the door closes.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE
dialogues.text: Dr. Guha turns to Varun. And smiles, holding up a bottle.

dialogues.speaker: DR. GUHA
dialogues.text: Tincher iodine... charcharaayega... He reaches for Varun's wound. Varun closes his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi and Devyani reach the car when they hear Varun shou in pain. They look back. Pakhi smiles to herself. The driver shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER
dialogues.text: Bechaara... Pakhi looks at him. Indicates that he should vacate the driver's seat.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Sarakiye...

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER
dialogues.text: Kaahe?  17 18 19 Lootera Shooting Draft vl

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Ek to bechaare motorcycle vaale ko naale mein dhakelte ho, gaadi chalaana nahin aata, aur poochte ho kaahe?

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER
dialogues.text: Hum dhakele?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Nahin to kya hum? His face falls. He moves to the passenger seat.

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER
dialogues.text: Aayiye...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A strong breeze hits Pakhi's face as she drives back. The car races by fields now lit by the late afternoon sun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi switches the lightbulb on and off, fascinated by the mechanism.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pg 9 17 18 19 The Zamindar looks at the lightbulb being unscrewed by an electrician. Majumdar stands next to him.

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Aap baar baar mazaak samajh kar taal dete hain. Zamindari unmoolan ka kanoon aaj, kal, kabhi bhi lagoo ho gaya to daanye haath ko baanya bhi nahin milaga malne ke liye...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: (to the electrician) Kya kharaabi aa gayee thi uss mein?

dialogues.speaker: ELECTRICIAN
dialogues.text: Iska paleeta udd gaya tha... kissi ne bahut bandbujh kiya hai iske saath...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Paleeta?

dialogues.speaker: ELECTRICIAN
dialogues.text: Tantuk... andar hota hai jisse roshni hoti hai...  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 10

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Bijli se nahin hoti roshni?

dialogues.speaker: ELECTRICIAN
dialogues.text: Bijli se paleeta jalta hai jisse roshni hoti hai...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Hahn, pata hai... vah jo bhi hota hai, poori haveli mein lagvaana hai... jo bhi kharcha aayega Majumdar sahab ko di deejiyega... He smiles at Majumdar. He walks.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: (to the electrician) Aur vah kya bola tha? Paleeta ka doosra naam?

dialogues.speaker: ELECTRICIAN
dialogues.text: Tantuk...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Tantuk... achcha hai... Majumdar follows him.

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Aap zara bhi gambhir nahin hai... aapko samajh mein nahin aa raha ha ki kuch nahin bachega aapke paas adhiniyam lagoo ho gaya to...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Ye kanoon kabhi nahin lagoo hoga.

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Hoga. Sarkar mein na to maharaajein baithe hain na zamindar, jo aapki vakaalat karenge. Vah jog baithe hain jinki aankh mein tabhi se kirkiri hai jab vah aapke neeche paida hue... yah log prajatantra ke naye zamindar hain. Pandrah acre zameen se ek dhela zyaada nahin rakhne denge aapko...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Koi baat nahin... pandrah acre hi sahi...

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Aur kamaai kahan se aayegi?

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Pandrah acre ka to lagaan aayega.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 11

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Zamindar khatam lagaan hazam Babuji... khud hi khet jotna padega, aur agar jutvaaoge to tankhwa deni padegi... They walk on, still arguing. Pakhi and Devyani sit in a room above, listening to the conversation.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Hamaare baba hamesha aapas mein bahas kyon karte hain?

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Pata nahin... mere baba ko lagta hai Zamindar Babu samajhte nahin hain, aur Zamindar Babu ko lagta hai mere baba aise hi bakte rahte hain...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kya bakte hain? Before Devyani can answer, both of them hear the sound of an approaching motorcycle. They look at each other, and get up quickly. They come to the balcony. Devyani nudges Pakhi.

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Udhar... Pakhi looks. Her POV: Varun stands at the entrance to the haveli, looking for some assistance. A bandage is plastered over his eye. He pulls the rope for the old bell. A servant walks up to him. Pakhi watches Varun as he talks to the servant.

dialogues.speaker: SERVANT
dialogues.text: Kahiye...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mera naam Varun Shrivastav hai...

dialogues.speaker: SERVANT
dialogues.text: Kaun jagah se padhaar rahe hain?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Archaeological Survey of India, Delhi...  20 21 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 12 The servant looks at Varun, tongue tied, finding it too hard to assimilate. Varun gives him a letter.

dialogues.speaker: SERVANT
dialogues.text: Yahin rukiye... Pakhi watches the servant walk up to the Zamindar and Majumdar.

dialogues.speaker: SERVANT
dialogues.text: Dilli ke aajal savediya se aaye hain...

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Kahan se?

dialogues.speaker: SERVANT
dialogues.text: Angrezi jagah hai... He hands the Zamindar the letter. As Pakhi watches, the servant comes back to Varun and leads him to the Zamindar. They shake hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar looks through books on the shelf. Pakhi walks with him.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Archaeologist hai... hamaari mandir ki zameen ke chaaron taraf khudai karna chahte hain... kahta hai koi puraani civilisation dabi padi hai hamaari zameen ke neeche. Pakhi looks at her father, waiting for more information. He finds the book he was looking for and pulls it out of the shelf. Walks away from her.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Raat ko khaane pe aa raha hai, khud hi pooch lena... Pakhi smiles. Music...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi sits in front of the mirror. She's dressed in a beautiful sari. Her hair is done up and so are her eyes. She looks at the clock in the mirror. Almost 8 o clock.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 22 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 13

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A clock strikes 8. Varun sits on a large chair at the foot of the stairs. He hears a voice behind him.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Varun Shrivastav...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (turns to look) Ji...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Peeche mat dekhna... He looks back in front.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Jis gaadi se aaj aapki takkar hui usse chalaane vaale ka naam Babu Singh tha...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Ji... aur aapka naam kya hai?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Zyaada hoshiyar banne ki koshish mat karo kyonki tum ho nahin...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Ji aap un dono mein se kaun vaali hain? There's no response. He turns to look. There's nobody there.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Mr. Shrivastav... Varun looks. The Zamindar is walking down the stairs. Varun stands. The Zamindar walks up to him, shakes his hand. He points to Pakhi, who seems to have magically appeared behind.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Ye hamari beti hai... Pakhi...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Ji...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Aur Pakhi bete, ye hai vah gentleman jinke baare mein...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Namaste...  23 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 14

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar and Varun sit at the dining table. Pakhi supervises the servants in setting dinner.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Likhna chahti hai hamari beti. vaise, likhti burra nahin hai... hamari library ki har kitaab par apna naam likh rakha hai...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks at him, mortified.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Baba... He smiles at her fondly.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Hum achcha likhte hain...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (polite) I'm sure... kaafi kam bolti hain aap Pakhi ji...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Ji...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: (to Varun) Archaeologists... mujhe hamesha lagta tha ki koi umradaraaj... puraane jang lage log hote honge... jo makdee ke jhalon mein apni jeevika dhondte hain...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Shayad isiliye hamaare department ko puraatan vibhaag kaha jaata hai... The Zamindar laughs. Varun smiles.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Food is being taken away. Pakhi stands and serves the Zamindar hot coffee.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: (to Varun) Rah kahan rahe ho tum?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Circuit house mein... mandir ke paas hai...  24 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 15

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Yah apna maatha kahan phod liya?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Meri motorcycle ki ek gaadi se mutbhed huyi thi...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Manikpur mein?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Ji...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Kaun chala raha tha?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Main hi chala raha tha...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Dono ek saath chalaaoge to phir mutbhed to hogi hi... Varun smiles. Pakhi controls her laughter. She moves to serve Varun.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Main motorcycle chala raha tha...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Of course...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Aur gaadi pata nahin, koi nauseekhiya chala raha tha... itni chaudi sadak par ek itni si motorcycle... phir bhi ussi mein bhidaane ja raha tha... inn andhe nauseekhiya ko gaadi kyon koi chalaane deta hai meri samajh mein nahin aata... Pakhi suddenly pours hot coffee on Varun's hand. He shout out in pain.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Sorry sorry... (to the servant) Jaldi thanda paani layiye...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar pours himself a drink, and another for Varun who sits in an armchair, his hand bandaged with tumeric. Pakhi looks among the books in the shelves.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 16

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Shukra hai tum iski coffee ke neeche aaye, kyonki vah gaadi jisse tum bhide the agar ye chala rahi hoti to phir shayad haath bacha hi nahin hota jalne ke liye... The Zamindar hands Varun his glass.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: (placing a record) Ek baar baitha tha main is nauseekhiya ke bagal mein... hum log bazaar ki taraf gaye... jaisa hamesha hota hai, hamaari gaadi dekhte hi log jhuk ke pranaam karne lag gaye. Unko dekh kar hamaari Pakhi bhi jhuk jhuk ke jawaab dene lagi... aur gaadi seedha aata chakki mein. Kaali gaadi safed vaapas aa gayee... Varun laughs.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Agli baar baithna seedha khaai mein le jaakar utaaroongi... saari Zamindari bhool jaaoge... The Zamindar goes towards his grammaphone, chooses a record.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Sarkar ne aapko pata hai na, Zamindar unmoolan aayog baithaaya hai... kabhi bhi kanoon lagoo ho sakta hai... The Zamindar doesn't answer.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Matlab?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kanoon ban gaya to Zamindaron ka sab kuch rashtriya khazaanon mein chala jaayega... (to the Zamindar) Is se pahle ki sab jabt ho jaaye, agar aap apni viraasat bechna chahe to main aise kuch khareedaar jaanta hoon. Jinse aksar hamaare department ka kaam chalta hai... achchi keemat bhi dete hain aur moonh bhi band rakhte hain... Music starts playing. Varun trails off, realising that he's being ignored. The music grows...  25 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 17

dialogues.speaker: LATER
dialogues.text: Varun walks between shelves of books, rows upon rows, looking at the immense collection. He comes back to the sitting area and sees Pakhi reading to the Zamindar from a book. He listens to the sound of her voice and the music.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kai dinon tak chulha roya, chhaki rahi udaas... kai dinon tak kaani kuttiya soi unke paas... kai dinon tak lagi bheet par chhipkaliyon ki gasht... kai dinon tak choohon ki bhi haalat rahi shikast... Varun then starts mouthing the words along with Pakhi. The Zamindar looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Daane aaye ghar ke andar kayi dinon ke baad... dhuan utha aangan se oopar kayi dinon ke baad... chamak uthi ghar bhar ki aankhen kai dinon ke baad... kauve ne khujlaayi pankhen kayi dinon ke baad... Silence...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Baba Nagarjun... asli naam Vaidhnath Mishra... Mere nanihaal Darbhanga ke rahne vaale the... Pakhi looks at him. The Zamindar clears his throat.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Tumne kya bataya tha, kahaan rah rahe ho tum?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A servant walks carries Varun's bags into the outhouse courtyard. Varun follows him, and behind Varun walks another young man, DEBDAS, who carries his own heavy bags They stop in the courtyard and look around - a simple, small courtyard with lots of rooms. The balcony of the main house surrounds them from all sides. The servant unlocks one of the rooms and takes their bags inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 18

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Aapne kaafi asar jamaya hai Varun Babu... uss badboodaar circuit house ki jagah ye shaandaar haveli... Varun smiles. From inside her room, Pakhi has a perfect view of the outhouse courtyard. She watches Varun and Deb checking out their room. She smiles to herself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Old temple ruins, some broken, some intact, in the middle of a dusty field. The Zamindar walks with Varun, Deb, Majumdar and Pakhi following close behind. Pakhi watches Varun more than often.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Ye jagah paanch sau saalon se vaisi ki vaisi hi hai. Na to humne kissi ko yahaan kuch banaane diya hai na bigaadne. Jo saaf safaai hoti rahi hai vah Majumdar sahab ke saamne hoti hai, aur inke pahle inke Pitaji ki dekhrekh mein hoti thi... They come to the centre temple. Recently made iron gates and padlocks cover the entrance to the interior. Inside is a beautiful idol of Kali.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Aur ye Kali ki murti Roychowdhury khaandaan ki dharohar hai... kam se kam teen sau saal puraani hai... Varun pulls out a camera from the case slung over his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Main dekh sakta hoon?

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Of course... Varun gets closer to the temple, frames and clicks. He then lowers the camera and looks at the idol, carefull

dialogues.speaker: AND
dialogues.text: 26 27 28 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 19

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the courtyard of the haveli, a movie projector is set up and beams it's images onto a makeshift screen. Varun, Deb and the Zamindar's close ones watch the film sitting on chairs, while a host of villagers watch the film while sitting on the floor. Varun leans closer to Deb.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kuch samajh mein aa raha hai Debdas Mukherjee?

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Sab kuch samajh mein aa raha hai... mere Ma Babuji aise hi baat karte hain... Varun smiles, and looks away. His eyes meet Pakhi's. They smile at each other and then look back at the screen

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: (not taking his eyes off the screen) Bangali seekh lo, abhi nahin to kabhi na kabhi seekhna padega...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Early morning light streams into Pakhi's room. She sits by the window, peeping out into the outhouse courtyard. Her POV: Varun shaves and Deb tunes his radio. After many strange noises it finally tunes itself to the right frequency - Geeta Dutt singing "Tadbeer Se Bigdi Hui". Deb beams, starts swaying to the music. Pakhi smiles, then walks over to her own radio and tunes it to the same song. She returns to the window and looks out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun looks at Deb doing his jig, razor in hand.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Baazi dekhi hai tumne? Varun shakes his head.  29 30 31 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 20

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Dekhi chahiye tumhe... isse kahte hai picture. Dev Anand number ek ka juaari hai iss mein. Aur kya hota hai, ek samay aisa aata hai... ki usse chunna hai. Bahut saara paisa aur uski bahan ki zindagi... ya sab kuchh chhod de sirf pyar ke liye... dekhna chahiye kya karta hai vah... aur kya ladta hai... aisa khada hokar... Deb stands, legs apart, torso crouched down.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Saamne se jitne chaahe lampat aa jaaye, majaal hai ki uske baalon ka style bigad jaaye... Varun washes his face.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Aur iss picture ka nirdeshak naya aadmi hai, koi Guru Dutt... naam suna hai?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Nahin.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Sunoge... ek din... har koi sunega... The song continues...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar's car drives past green fields, kicking up red earth. A few people bow down to the car as it passes by. Varun and Deb follow on the motorcycle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar breaks the ceremonial coconut at the digging site. Pakhi, Varun, Majumdar, Devyani and Deb applaud, as do the villagers assembled. Milk is poured on the idol of Kali as the priests perform a pooja.

dialogues.speaker: LATER
dialogues.text: 32 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 21 Varun talking to Deb. Majumdar stands with them.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (pointing) Yah dono mandir ke beech ki jo jagah hai, hum yahaan khudaai karenge... (points elsewhere) Idhar hamaara camp lagega... Deb nods. Varun turns to Majumdar.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Aur kuch mazdooron ki zaroorat padegi hamein... milenge?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fifteen labourers sit in the sun. Deb stands in front of them.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Aap logon ko yahaan khudaai karni hai, kya karna hai...

dialogues.speaker: LABOURER 1
dialogues.text: Khudaai...

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: To... (imitating Dev Anand) Phir savaal ye hai ki... aapko khodna aata hai? The labourers look at each other.

dialogues.speaker: LABOURER 2
dialogues.text: Sahib, yah kudaal kaahe ke liye laaye hain... khodne ke liye hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: to laaye...

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Very good...

dialogues.speaker: LABOURER 1
dialogues.text: Hum khod kyon rahe hain?

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Hum khod rahe hain kyonki zameen hai, usse... khodte hain...

dialogues.speaker: LABOURER 2
dialogues.text: Matlab andar kuchau dabal hai ki bas gadhha banana hai?

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Andar hi to hai jo hai... baahar to sirf... He looks around, sees Majumdar looking at him silently. 32  33 34 35

dialogues.speaker: 35A
dialogues.text: 36 37 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 22

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Vah... bhai mujhe nahin pata... bade saahab ko pata hai... He walks on, past Majumdar.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Ye theek hai...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Music continues... The Zamindar, Varun and Pakhi sit at the dinner table. Animated conversation between Varun and the Zamindar. Pakhi watches them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun explains to the labourers what they are supposed to do, how to dig down in a straight line, how to collect the earth and where to keep it. Deb supervises the erection of the tents. Tables, chairs and other paraphernalia go under them. Music continues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi and Varun animatedly read to the Zamindar from a book.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun constructs a wooden frame and stretches a painting canvas across it. He sets up the canvas on an easel. Deb watches him. From her room, So does Pakhi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun shaves while Deb does another jig to the song. From the house, Pakhi watches, smiling. Varun and Deb laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun finishes writing a letter and puts it into a large envelope along with a photograph of the idol. He addresses the letter to "Mr. R Bajpai" He gives it to Deb.  38

dialogues.speaker: 38C
dialogues.text: 39 40 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 23

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The zamindar reads a newspaper, very seriously. We see the headline - "The End of Zamindari. Estates and Acquisitions Act Passed." He puts the newspaper down and looks at Majumdar across the table. Radio Song ends. Overlap a radio broadcast about the Zamindar Abolition Act.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the fields, villagers celebrate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar and Majumbar stand on the terrace of the haveli, looking at the celebrations.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Sab bahut khush hai...

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Sab nahin...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A motorcade of three cars makes it's way through the streets of Bengal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The motorcade enters the Zamindar's peaceful and green farmhouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar looks out of the car at the passing orchard. Pakhi sits next to him.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Yah bageecha bhi le jaayenge?

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Hahn...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Lekin le jaake karenge kya?

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Baant denge gaon vaalon mein... sab muft ke aam khaayenge...  4l Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 24

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar sits at the edge of the pond, holding a fishing rod. Servants around him wait, some bored, some fidgety. Varun and Deb sit under a tree, watching the Zamindar.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Ustad Allahrakha tabla baja rahe hain pet mein... maare gud gud ke haalat kharab hai...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Pahli rohu jab tak kaanta nahin kaategi, tabla bajta rahega... parampara janaab...

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: (imitating the Zamindar ) Of course... Tab tak to Vilayat Khan bhi bajaana shuru kar denge...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Under another tree, Pakhi and Devyani:

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Zamindari hamari khatam hui hai, machliyan kyon maatam mana rahi hai... itna hi dukh hai unko to Baba ke kaante par jaan kyon nahin de deti... She looks from her father to Varun. Devyani notices.

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Varun Babu? Pakhi looks at Devyani, who smiles.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Varun looks down from the mango he's been watching and his eyes catch Pakhi's. Deb notices.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Galat jagah ja rahe ho Varun babu...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tum paagal ho gayee ho... main to aise hi dekh rahi thi udhar...

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Aise kaise dekh rahi thi mujhe bhi dikh raha hai...  42 43 44 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 25

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kaise dekh rahi thi?

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Vaise, jaise dekha jaata hai, tab jab ho jaata hai...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kya ho jaata hai? Tumhaare bhookh ke kaaran dimaag bhi chhutti par chala gaya hai...

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Naaraaz kyon ho rahe ho? Tum jo paka rahe ho, main to bas un khayali pulao mein dam bhar raha hoon...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kuch nahin paka rahi hoon main...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Varun looks at Deb is silence. Just then, a cheer goes up. Everyone looks - the Zamindar has caught his fish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A fire burns. Fish roast in it. Everyone sits around the fire. Varun and Pakhi find themselves on opposite sides of the fire. Pakhi with Devyani, Varun with Deb. Very conscious of each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the last light of the day, the Zamindar stands by the river, watching it flow by. Pakhi comes up to him, touches his arm. He puts his arm around her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The motorcade makes it's way out of the orchard.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE CAR
dialogues.text: The Zamindar looks back at the receding lake and farmhous When he turns again there are tears in his eyes. Pakhi, sitting next to him, holds his hand.  45 46 47 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 26 The Zamindar forces a smile and looks at Varun in the front seat.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Mahine ke aakhir mein aap bhi chhod ke chale jaaoge Varun Babu?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (without turning around) Ji...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: (looks at Pakhi) Main aur mere tote ke alaava koi saath nahin rahne vaala... Pakhi looks at the back of Varun's head. She then watches the darkness outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi stands at the window, looking into the outhouse. Her POV: Varun is contemplating the canvas set up on an easel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deb sits on the doorstep, watching Varun watching the canvas, which we can see now is blank.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Bhaiya ye chitrakaari aapke bas ki baat nahin hai... na to aap raja ho, na Ravi Varma ho... yah rang holi ke liye bacha kar rakho... canvas par kyon barbaad karte ho...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Beta Debdas... ek din jab masterpiece banaoonga na, tab dekhna...

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Masterpiece to baad mein banega pehle uspe koi rang to daalne ki himakat karo... canvas hai, khaa nahi jayega... Debdas gets up.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Pakhi continues to look at Varun and the canvas. Then she suddenly smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi hands the Zamindar a cup of tea.  48 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 27

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mujhe painting seekhni hai... The Zamindar, sitting on his armchair and reading a paper looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Abhi achaanak ye painting ka bhoot kahaan se savar ho gaya?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Achaanak nahin savar hua hai. Bachpan se savar hai... aap hi to dikhaate rahte ho... kitni baar kaha hai maine, mujhe bhi karni hai painting...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Tumne kabhi nahin kaha...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kaha tha... aap kabhi sunte hi kahaan ho jab main kuch kahti hoon...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Bol do Majumdar ko... dhoond laayega kissi ko... Devyani ko bhi pooch lo...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Usse khaana banaane ki alaava kuch nahin jaanna seekhna hai... (pause) Aur baahar kissi ko dhoondne ki kya zaroorat hai... apne Varun babu kaafi achche chitrakaar hai...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun chokes on his cup of tea. He looks at the Zamindar. Deb, standing behind him, tries to look serious.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Hamein pata hai aap kaafi vyast ho apni khojbeen mein... phir bhi, agar ek do ghante nikaal lete to... Varun looks at Pakhi, who looks at him innocently.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Ye bhi seekh legi aapse... khush ho jaayegi. Aur humko bhi pta chal jaayegi iski chitrakaari... aur isse bhi... Varun nods. He's about to get up.  49 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 28

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Apni chai to khatam karte jaao... He sits down again and drinks his cup, deliberately avoiding looking at Deb, who's staring into the back of his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun and Deb walk towards the outhouse.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Tumne kabhi deewal bhi rangi hai? Uss canvas ko bas ghoorte hue hi dekha hai tumhe... You're too bloody scared to put any paint on it... khudai se putaai tak ek hafte mein... aapki raftaar kabile tareef hai Varun Babu... They reach the outhouse. Varun walks into the room. Deb stands at the door.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Master Moshai Badi kahte hai isse... teacher's quarters...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (from inside) Toh?

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Bas bata raha hoon... vaise Pakhi ko padhaane tumse pahle koi master moshai kabhi nahin aaye... vah gayee thi unke paas Shantiniketan mein padhne... English Literature... Varun comes out of the room and starts walking out of the outhouse. Deb follows him.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Tumko bahut pata hai... Sherlok Holmes ki aulaad ho tum... baahar chowk ke baniye se poochtach karke aaye ho... They reach the motorcycle. Varun gets on. Deb holds him by the arm.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: (softly) Ye tumko bhi pata hai aur humko bhi... ki ye poori kasrat kyon ho rahi hai... bholapan apna usko dikhaana jo tumhaare pyar mein podhti ja rahi hai... mujhe nahin... aur jab Bajpai uncle aayenge to unko samjhaana ki kyon painting sikha rahe the...  50 51 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 29 He leaves Varun's arm. Varun drives off. Deb watches him go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun sits in his tent, reading a book on painting. A worker enters the tent and places a parcel on the table

dialogues.speaker: WORKER
dialogues.text: Jo jo aap mangaaye rahe Varun babu sab to nahin mila... baaki sab paint, brush, keen laaye hain... Varun nods. The worker leaves. Varun gets back to his book.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun sets up an easel inside the library while Majumdar sits in a corner, going over some papers, looking at Varu now and then. Pakhi peeps in from outside the library. She turns to Devyani.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kaisi lag rahi hoon?

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Bahut sundar... ab jaao... She pushes Pakhi.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Dhakka kyon de rahi ho? Pakhi composes herself and takes a step forward. Then turns around again.

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Ab kya?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Agar kuch nahin hua to?

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Matlab?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Agar unka pahle se hi koi ho to?

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Unse baat nahin karogi to pata kaise chalega hai ya nahin... She pushes Pakhi.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 30

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Ab jaao... Pakhi stumbles and composes herself just as she enters the library. Varun sees her walking towards him and keeps watching her, completely unaware of his gaping mouth. She sits next to him. Still a little awkward.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Pahle kabhi koshish ki hai? Mera matlab... jab Shantiniketan mein padhti thi, kuch to seekha hoga...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aapko pata hai main Shantiniketan mein padhi hoon...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Nahin... matlab... Zamindar babu ki beti ho na...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Thoda bahut seekha hai...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mujhse kya seekhna chahti ho?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aap bataao...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Landscapes se kyon na shuru kare... nature ko canvas par utaarna aasaan hai, haath bhi sadh jaayega, phir dheere dheere...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (interrupting) Nahin... humko seb aur aam banaane ke baad sabse pahle landscapes hi sikhaya tha... bahut aasaan hai... hum portraits kyon nahin seekh sakte... Varun looks at her, unsure.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aapko bharosa nahin hai maine landscapes pahle kiya hai... dikhaoon? Varun nods. Pakhi begins to draw on the easel, with ease.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 31

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Yah mandir ke bagal mein jo khaadi shuru hoti hai... dekhi hai na aapne?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Ye to bilkul... (looks at her) Tumko to pata hai...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mujhe bas pattiyan banana nahin aata... hamesha galat banaati hoon.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Pattiyan (laughs) Bahut aasaan hai banaani...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Dikhayiye... She hands him the brush.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Ye dekho... He mixes the paints.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Thoda hara lo... aur thoda kaala, aur... He paints very amateurish leaves, almost block like.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Ye kya hai?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Pattiyan...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Ye?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Modern Art mein aise hi pattiyan banti hai... She looks at him, and suddenly giggles.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aapko painting nahin aati na... Varun looks at her and then at Majumdar, who hasn't noticed.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Shhh... chup... She continues to giggle while Varun looks mortified.  52 53 54 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 32

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi sits with Devyani in her room.

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Tum unko sikha rahi ho?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Ab class chalte rahne ke liye kissi ko to sikhaana hoga aur kissi ko seekhna... hai ki nahin?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun and Deb eat in the outhouse.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Babut badhiya... banne chale rangrez, pakde gaye angrez...

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Kya bola tha maine... unke andar bhi vahi kulbula raha hai jo tumhaare andar se ubal ubal kar baahar aa raha hai...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mai to hamesha se painting seekhna chahta tha... ab mauka mila hai to seekh raha hoon... Deb stares at him.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Pakhi smiles. Music... leading into SONG # 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MONTAGE begins: Pakhi teaches Varun how to paint - first with sketching, then mixing paints, then painting it on. Their fingers touch, their hands accidentally meet, they exchange awkwa smiles, they talk. Their relationship grows. And through the teaching, a painting takes shape on the canvas - of a tree, full of leaves. Towards the end of the song, we see Varun setting up his camera on a tripod. He and Pakhi sit next to each other, very formal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 55 56 57 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 33 The camera clicks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The songs ends as we see the painting up on the library wall. The Zamindar looks at it, smiling. Pakhi stands with him.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Achcha banaate hain... Pakhi looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Maine banaya hai... The Zamindar smiles at her.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Matlab achcha sikhaate hain... She looks at the painting.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: The Zamindar sits reading a book. He looks up towards the door. Majumdar stands there, looking very serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar and Majumdar watch a very sweaty official looking man walk up to them. Two men follow him. The man takes off his cap and gives the Zamindar a letter

dialogues.speaker: MAN
dialogues.text: Biswajeet Roy... Treasury Department. The Zamindar goes through the letter and looks up at Roy, who smiles.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Ye kaun sa department hai?

dialogues.speaker: ROY
dialogues.text: Aadesh par sarkaari muhar lagi hai, dekh leejiye...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A door opens and we enter a storage chamber. All around, valuable pieces and artifacts - paintings, swords, helmets...  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 34 Roy walks through the storage chamber with the Zamindar and Majumdar, looking at pieces of value carefully. His man follows. He picks up a gold glass.

dialogues.speaker: ROY
dialogues.text: Yah... aapko...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: East India Company ne diya tha hamare Dadaji ko...

dialogues.speaker: ROY
dialogues.text: Do sau saal puraana hai kam se kam...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Usse zyaada... Roy nods and gives it to the man with him.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Ye kya kar rahe hain aap?

dialogues.speaker: ROY
dialogues.text: Yah hamaare itihaas ki dharohar hai jo sarkaari khaazaane mein jaayegi aur vahaan se shaayad sangrahalaya mein...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: (getting angry) Yah hamaare Roychowdhury khandaan ki dharohar hai. Ye aap nahin le ja sakte... Majumdar touches him on the arm to calm him down.

dialogues.speaker: ROY
dialogues.text: Roychowdhury Babu...

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: (snapping at Roy) Zamindar Babu. Roy gives Majumdar a cold look, then looks at the Zaminda

dialogues.speaker: ROY
dialogues.text: East India Company ne aapko jo bhi diya tha vah unka nahin tha... unhone churaya tha... agar aap nahin denge to hamein aapko giraftar karke lena padega... They all look at each other.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 58 59 60 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 35

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar watches, heartbroken, as artifacts, statues, precious coins and other valuables are put into the back of a truck. He signs a paper that Roy puts in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Kitni baar kaha aapko, lekin hamesha taal dete the... Roy puts on his hat and gets into the truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar pours himself a drink. Majumdar stands behind.

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Abhi bhi wagt hai... vah dobaara aayenge, baar baar aayenge... jo nahin le gaye hain usse bacha lo... The Zamindar sips his drink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi and Varun sit at the crest of a valley, a river flowing below. The sun is on the verge of setting. The easel is set up in front of them but they haven't bothered to paint anything on. They watch the sunset in silence. Finally, Pakhi speaks...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Main hamesha itni jaldi mein hoti hoon ki baba mujhe Pakhi express bulaate hain...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kya karna chahti ho tum?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Main likhna chahti hoon... mujhe dher saari kitaabein likhni hai... kabhi kabhi sochti hoon yahaan se bhaag jaoon apne Dalhousie vaale ghar mein, aur vahaan baith kar likhti rahoon, likhti rahoon... baahar barf girti rahegi aur andar main...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Likhti rahogi likhti rahogi...  He smiles. She looks Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 36

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Hahn...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Bahut sundar jagah hai Dalhousie... aur jab barf padhti hai na, thand mein... (fakes a shiver) Bahut mazaa aata hai...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Vahaan pe ek raja ka mahal bhi hai na?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Hahn. Jandrighat Mahal. Unke Raja ke paas kitna kuch hai. Baba se dus guna zyaada...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Aur unke paas ek bahut keemti Ganesh ki puraani murti hai.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Sach mein?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Hahn... khaalis sone ki. Paanch sau saal purani... at him.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tum ye sab jo khudaai dhoondai karte ho tumhe achcha lagta hai?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mujhe yahi hai jo aata hai. (beat) Jo karta hoon uske alaava kabhi aur kuch kiya nahin...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Agar kabhi mauka mille kuch karne ka to kya karna chahoge? Varun doesn't reply.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Bataao na...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Ek baar marne se pahle Chandratal dekhna chahta hoon...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Vah kahan hai?  61 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 37

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Manali se bahut aage. Himalay ke beechon beech. Neela hara paani. Aur zara si bi awaaz nahin... She looks at him, never having seen this side of him before.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (whispers) Bilkul bhi nahin?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (looks at her, whispers back) Nahin...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (whispers) Aur?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (whispers) Ek aisa masterpiece paint karna chahta hoon jisse log yaad rakhein...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Sach mein?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kissi ko bataana nahin...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aur bataya toh? They look at each other. They're very close. Pakhi closes her eyes. Varun looks at her, but doesn't do anything. When she opens her eyes, she sees him packing up the ease She watches him walk towards the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun drives. Pakhi looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aap ko ye khandar, puraani murti, puraane mandir... in sab ke ilaava kuch samajh mein nahin aata na? He doesn't respond. She looks at him, then picks up his packet of cigarettes from the dashboard. She lights one. Smokes. She coughs. He looks at her, smiles at her stupidity. She coughs again.  62 63 64 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 38 He's about to say something when there's a loud bang and a rhythmic flapping sound. Varun stops the car and gets out. The rear tyre is flat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's dark now. Varun shuts the boot of the car and wipes his hands on a rag. He opens the door and gets in, looks at Pakhi and reacts with shock. She's slumped in her seat, in the middle of a very bad asthma attack, struggling to breathe. He helps her sit up.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kya hua? Gasping for breath, she points to a small bag on the seat Varun opens it and finds a syringe and vial. He looks at Pakhi. She nods. He quickly loads the syringe and takes Pakhi's arm. Rolls up the sleeve of her blouse and injects the liquid. He then holds her hand and gently rubs her back, till her breathing slowly comes back to normal. Pakhi starts shivering. Varun takes off his jacket and wraps it around her. And he holds her this way for a while. They sit in silence, and then look at each other. Without warning, Pakhi kisses Varun. He looks at her, she at him. For a long while. Music...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun and Pakhi drive back, both silent, illuminated by the reflection of the car's lights on the road.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun carries Pakhi in his arms through the corridors of the haveli. The Zamindar and maids come running towards them. Varun gently lets her down. The Zamindar and maids take her and support her through the corridors.  65 66 67 68 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 39 Varun watches her go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar sits on the edge of Pakhi's bed, fanning her, looking at her for a long time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON Varun's face. The sound of rocks being hammered. He absently looks into the deep trench that has been dug, seeing the workers hammer away at the rocks.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Varun Babu... Varun turns around and sees the Zamindar standing behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar and Varun walk, away from the noise.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Bahut bahut dhanyavaad karna chahta hoon aapka...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Aap mujhe sharminda kar rahe hain...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Main kabhi usse akele jaane nahin deta... kab pata daura aa jaaye... vah bol ke thodi na aata hai... saavdhan, main aa raha hoon... He smiles weakly, then looks away, embarrassed. He starts walking away. Then turns.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Kabhi bhi koi bhi zaroorat pade maang leejiyega, jo chaahe... hum denge... hamaara vaada hai... Varun nods. The Zamindar walks towards his car. Varun watches him go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun sits on the outhouse steps, smoking a cigarette. Deb sits next to him.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Pakhi achchi ladki hai...  69 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 40

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Hmmm...

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Aur jaate jaate tumhe uska dil todna padega... Varun looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Tum todoge, todna to padega hi na... Varun looks away.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Usse itne sapne mat bunaane do ki jab tum jaao vah marr hi jaye... Silence. Deb gets up and walks towards the outhouse.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Aur agar main ye kahoon ki mujhe Pakhi se vaakai pyar hai to?

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Pyaar karne ki suvidha aapko nahin hai Shrivastav sahab... Aap pyar mein badkismati ke mulaajim hain... aapko pyar karna ho to anumati leni padegi. Aur anumati vah kathor- dil chacha aapko denge nahin... Deb goes inside. Varun reaches into his pocket and pulls out the photograp of him and Pakhi. He looks at it for a while, then looks up towards Pakhi's room. She is standing behind the curtain, looking at him. He can't see her but he knows she's there. They look at each other a long time. SONG # 2 begins.

dialogues.speaker: SONG
dialogues.text: INTERCUT between Pakhi and Varun. Her happiness at the way the relationship is going. In the haveli. His inner turmoil at the way the relationship is going. At the site and in the outhouse. Deb watching him all the time.  70 71 72 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 41 Towards the end of the song, Pakhi gets ready - sari, hair, jewellery. She does her eyes, looks herself over in the mirror one last time and gets up. She takes the easel from her room and walks out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun looks at his watch while sitting in the tent. He keeps sitting there. SONG ENDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi waits in the library, the easel set up in front of her. She looks at her watch, then looks at the door. No sign of Varun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun stands inside the tent with Deb and two labourers. A map is spread out on the table. Varun draws on it.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Neeche jaakar ek is taraf seedha khodna hai, doosra theek ulti disha mein... pahle ulti disha mein khodo aur saari saari mitti baahar nikaal kar khaali karo... They hear a car coming and look, sees the Zamindar's car arriving.

dialogues.speaker: LABOURER 1
dialogues.text: Memsahib... Varun folds the map and places it under another one. He watches Pakhi walk towards the tent. Deb and the labourer leave as she enters.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Varun Babu... Varun looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aaj aap class mein nahin aaye...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Hahn, hamaara kaam khatam hone vaala hai... samay bhi kam bacha hai, isliye...  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 42

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aap chaho to hum yahaan bhi seekh sakte hain...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Nahin... yahaan nahin...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Koi baat nahin... to kal aap aayenge na...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kal... (looks at Deb) Nahin...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Parson? He looks at her, helpless. He looks on. She looks

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tarson?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Narson? Agle hafte?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Agle hafte hum vaapas jaa rahe hain... at him.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Koi baat hai jo aap kah nahin rahe hain? Varun is silent. Silence. She looks

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kuch galat hua hai humse? Naraaz hain aap?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Nahin... Pakhi ji, kaafi kaam hai yahaan... mere log mera moonh dekh rahe hain...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Main bhi to vahi kar rahi hoon...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Behtar hoga aap jayiye... at him, anger slowly brimming up.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 43

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (snaps) Behtar hoga aap mar jaayiye! Pakhi storms out of the tent. Varun watches her go. Deb enters.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Kam kar len? They walk out of the tent together and head towards the trench. Pakhi reaches the car, then stops and looks back. She walks back towards Varun, fast and furious. Speaks to his back.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tum aisa kyon kar rahe ho mere saath? Varun looks at Pakhi. She's fuming. All around, workers are looking at them. Varun takes Pakhi by the arm and leads her away. They reach a quieter place. She shakes his hand off.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kya ho gaya hai aaj tumhe?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Hamein kya ho gaya hai? Aapko kya ho gaya hai? Aisa kyon kar rahe hain aap mere saath? Jaise ki aap humse milna hi nahin chahte ho... He doesn't reply.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Hamara koi maayna hai aapki zindagi mein? No reply.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kuch mahsoos hota hai aapko hamaare liye? No reply.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Jo samay humne sang mein bitaaya? Vah?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Tumhe painting seekhni thi...  73 74 75 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 44

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aur kya sikhaayi aapne... jab aapko aata hi nahin tha painting karna to kyon hahn kiya aapne? Tabhi mana kar dete... He doesn't reply. Tears well up in her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aur vah raat? Silence.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kyon? No reply.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aap mujhse pyaar karte hain Varun babu? No reply.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mera dil rakhne ke liye hahn bol deejiye... He doesn't reply. Her tears begin to fall. She turns and walks away, back to the car. He watches her go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi drives back, tears streaming down. She stops the car at the side of the road and breaks down completely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Under a flaming orange sky, Varun sits at the temple site Overlap his voice...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Majdooron ke jaane ke baad hum...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside the tent, the map is laid out on the table again. Varun speaks to Deb.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Iss disha mein mein khodenge... jo mitti yahaan se niklegi vah yahaan jaayegi... teen raaton mein hamein...  76 77 78 79 80 81 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 45 His voice trails off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two labourers dig inside the trench. Varun stands at the rim of the trench with a torch, looki inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devyani holds Pakhi as she cries.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Vah humse pyaar nahin karte Devi...

dialogues.speaker: DEVYANI
dialogues.text: Vah jhoot bol rahe hain... The camera moves to the window. We see Deb and Varun return from the temple site, mud all over their boots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun washes the mud off his shoes in the bathroom, pre occupied. Deb watches him from the door.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Itna mat socho... jo kiya sahi kiya... Varun looks at him sharply.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mere sar par mandraate mat raho meri antaraatma ban ke! So jaao.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun stands outside the door to the outhouse, looking up at Pakhi's shut window.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Hamaari gaadi lene aa rahein hain kal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar hands Varun a drink and takes a seat. Pakhi isn't there.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Kolkata ke ek laatsahab ko bechi hai... They drink in silence. 76 77 78 79 80 81  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 46

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Duniya badal gayee hai Varun Babu... aap logon ki behtar ho gayee hai, hamari khatam ho gayee hai. Itni gehri aadat ho gayee thi iss zindagi ki ki aapke, Majumdar ke saavdhan karne par bhi... lagta nahin tha ki zamindari lutne ka matlab sab chala jaayega... aap log angrezon se aazaad ho gaye, hum aazaadi se barbaad ho gaye...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Abhi bhi bahut kuch hai aapke paas... jiski antarashtriya bazaar mein kaafi keemat hai... khareeddaar abhi bhi ghoom rahe hain chaaron taraf

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Sarkar hamein barbaad karna chahti hai kyonki unhe lagta hai hum angrezon ke dost the... hum majboor the... (gets up) Aazaad Hind fauj ko kitna paisa diya humne... hamaari galti hai agar sarkar unki aazaadi ki ladaai accept nahin karti hai... The Zamindar makes another drink. Varun watches him in silence.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Jaao tum... tumhe bhi apna kaam karna hai... jaao...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Good night Zamindar Babu... Varun walks towards the door when the Zamindar stops him.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Varun Babu... Varun turns.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Bula lo unhe... (shows all around him) Bech daalo sab... bechbach ke chala jaata hoon angrezon ke desh... bula lo... Varun nods and walks out. The Zamindar takes another sip and casually flings his glass across the room.  82 83 84 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 47

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deb is sleeping, snoring. Varun tries to shake him awake.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Deb... abe Debdas... uth... He snores. Varun slaps him. Deb wakes with a start and immediately produces a gun from under his pillow, points it at Varun. They look at each other.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Usse andar rakh...

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: (touches his cheek) Tumne maara mujhe?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Zamindar bechne ko taiyyar hai... On Deb's face, his eyes light up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun and Deb walk towards the entrance of the haveli. The Zamindar, Pakhi, Devyani, Majumdar and the servants are already gathered there in front of the Zamindar's car. Everyone looks sad. The Zamindar hands the keys of the car to a YOUNG GENTLEMAN. Overlap the Zamindar's voice:

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Meet Mr. Mukhopadhyay... he's taking our car...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Varun and Mukhopadhyay shake hands.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: To Calcutta?

dialogues.speaker: MUKHOPADHYAY
dialogues.text: Yes...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (to the Zamindar) Deb inke saath ja sakta hai?  85 86 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 48

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: The car leaves. The Zamindar and Pakhi watch it go, both very sad. Varun stands behind them.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Zamindar Babu... do din baad him bhi chale jaayenge...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Mahina poora ho gaya? Itni jaldi?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Hamaara kaam khatam ho gaya... Pakhi looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Samay hi barbaad kiya... milla kuch nahin... The Zamindar looks at him. Varun smiles awkwardly and walks off. Pakhi watches him go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi looks out of her window towards the outhouse. Her POV: The room to Varun's door is closed. She can see light from under the door. She keeps looking at the door, then moves away from the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi moves stealthily through the haveli, careful not to make a sound. The sound of Indian classical music gets closer. Pakhi walks past the library door, making sure her father doesn see her. She walks through corridors, down the staircase and into the outhouse. She comes up to Varun's door and knocks. He opens it. Sees her standing there. They look at each other and then he moves out of the way, letting her into the room. He shuts the door and faces her.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mat jaao...  87 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 49 Tears form in Pakhi's eyes. Varun moves forward and holds her. They embrace.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Please mat jaao...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Shhhhhbh... He embraces her tighter. She sits on the bed. He kneels in front of her. They look at each other, silently. He then kisses her on the eyes. They touch noses. They embrace again, slowly.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: They lie in bed, facing each other. He's asleep. She watches him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun opens his eyes. Early morning light comes through the windows. He sees Pakhi, who sits by the closed window and writes on a piece of paper.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kya likh rahi ho? She doesn't reply.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Koi kahaani likh rahi ho?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Hmmm...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kya kahaani?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kahaani hai bas...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kahaani mein kya hai? Pakhi is silent.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Ladka hai kahaani mein? She nods.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 50

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Aur ek ladki? She nods again. She looks

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Dono pyar karte hain ek doosre se... at him.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Nahin.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Pyar mein padne vaale hain?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Pata nahin.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Dono baat kar rahe hain? Pakhi goes back to writing. She looks

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (whispers) Ladka kuch pooch raha hai? at him, doesn't reply.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (whispers) Vah jawaab nahin de rahi hai... naraaz hai ladke se?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (whispers) Hahn.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (whispers) Kyonki vah jaa raha hai?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (whispers, emotional) Kyonki vah bahut savaal pooch raha hai...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (whispers) Aur ladki kya kar rahi hai?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (whispers, emotional) Vah usse bata rahi hai ke itne savaal mat poocho...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (whispers) To usne savaal poochne band kiye?  88 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 51

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (emotional) Vah bewakoof hai... usse bolne par bhi kuch samajh mein nahin aa raha hai... A tear starts to roll down Pakhi's cheek. He walks to her.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Usne ladki ko bataaya, ki vah kitni sundar hai, ki usse sundar duniya mein koi nahin hai... She looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Nahin...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Aur ladki ne ladke ko bola ki vah duniya mein sabse zyaada usse pyar karti hai?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Nahin.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Phir vah kab bolegi? She doesn't reply. He comes very close.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kab bolegi? They stay very close for a moment. Then Pakhi pulls away.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Subah ho gayee... mujhe jaana hai... He holds her hand, not letting go. They look at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi walks through the haveli, silently. She comes to her room and enters, shuts the door behind her. And then notices her father lying on her bed, asleep. She quickly turns around and opens the door again when he calls out to her.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Pakhi bete...  89 90 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 52 She turns, looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Usko bolo mujhse milne ko...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar sits with Pakhi, looking at her. say anything. The servant walks in with Varun.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: (to Pakhi) Tum jaao... She gets up.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Aur darwaaze band kar do... She looks at Varun as she walks to the door. She shuts the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar looks at Varun.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Vaapas kab jaa rahe ho?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Parson...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Kabhi humne tumhaare Ma Babuju ke baare mein nahin poocha...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mere Ma Babuji nahin hai. Mujhe yaad bhi nahin vah kaise the... mere chacha ne mujhe paala, padhaya, saara kaam sikhaya. Jo bhi main jaanta hoon sab unka sikhaya hua hai. Hamaara department bhi vahi chalaate hai.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Vah kahan rahte hain?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kalkatta mein.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Unse mil sakte hain hum? Varun is silent.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Kya baat hai? 89 She doesn't 90  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 53

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (beat) Vah nahin milenge...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Kyon?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Vah manaa kar denge.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Kya mana kar denge?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Unko pata chala Pakhi ke baare mein to mujhe goli maar denge... The Zamindar looks at him. Just then, the servant enters with a tray of tea. In the silence that ensues, he pours tea cups for both Varun and the Zamindar. They sit through the silence, the Zamindar watching Varun. The servant leaves, shutting the door behind him.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Zamindari to ab chali gayee hai. Jo sarkar chhodegi ya tum bikvaaoge usske alaava Pakhi hi ek hai jo hamara hai... Varun nods.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Kal raat bhar vah tumhaare saath thi aur hum uske kamre mein uska intezaar kar rahe the... Varun looks away.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Hamaare yahaan nahin hota jo tum dono ne kiya... kahin bhi nahin hota. Aur jab hota hai... He trails off, emotional. Varun looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Main Pakhi se shaadi karoonga... The Zamindar looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Main bas chacha ko nahin bata sakta. Hum shaadi karke kahin aur chale jaayenge...  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 54 The Zamindar keeps looking at him.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Main Pakhi ko bahut pyaar karta hoon. Main poori koshish karoonga usse khush rakhne ki. Main jaan laga doonga lekin usse dukh nahin pahunchne doonga... agar aap anumati dein to... The Zamindar gets emotional. He nods. Varun touches his feet. The Zamindar embraces him.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Main jaanta hoon pakhi tumhaare saath khush rahegi... On Varun's face...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A shehnai player and a tabalchi sit in the courtyard of the haveli, playing music.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar stands in front of a mirror, getting ready. He dictates a letter while Majumdar writes it down.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Zamindar Soumitra Roychowdhury... Majumdar writes.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Abhi bhi Zamindar bula sakta hoon na apne aap ko?

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Manikpur mein to hamesha hi Zamindar rahenge aap... The Zamindar smiles.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Theek hai... phir... Zamindar Soumitra Roychowdhury aapko apni suputri saudaamini Pakhi aur Varun Shrivastav ke vivaah mein saadar aamantrit karte hain...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar and Majumdar walk through a corridor.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Ab aamantran chapvaane ka samay to hai nahin abhi... chaar ladkon ko bhej deejiye bicycle par hamari (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 94 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 55

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: taraf se sab ko nyauta dene. Aur doctor sahab, daakbabu, daroga ji ko aap khud hi jaakar aamantrit karen... Majumdar nods.

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Aap itne taiyyar hokar kahan jaa rahe hain?

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Ja nahin raha hoon, koi aa raha hai...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: A car drives up in front of the haveli. Deb and a dignified middle aged man get down. BAJPAI.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Bajpai and the Zamindar walk through a corridor. Bajpai notices the shehnai player.

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Koi jalsa ho raha hai?

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Hamaari beti ki sagai hai...

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Wah... badhai ho aapko... kin mahanubhav ko apni beti de rahe hain?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun sits on the outhouse bed, Deb stands in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Tum vivaah kar rahe ho, Pakhi se...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Sagaai. Deb looks at Varun, who doesn't meet his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Kya baat hai Varun? Kya chhupa rahe ho?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kuch nahin...  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 56

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Kuch to hai jo tum nahin kah rahe ho... Varun is silent.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Bajpai ji ko kya bataaoge?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Pata nahin.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: To phir sagaai kyon kar rahe ho? Usse poora hi khatam karke jaane ka iraada hai? Varun stays silent.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Sagaai kahaan hai?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mandir mein.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Kab?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kal... He looks at Deb, then gets up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Majumdar opens the clock to the storage chamber. The Zamindar and Bajpai stand outside. Varun walks towards them from a distance.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Aapko sagai samaroh tak rukna chahiye... Varun ko bhi achcha lagega...

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Zaroor rukta Zamindar babu, lekin jahaaj pakadna hai... Varun reaches them.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Bajpai ji... He shakes hands with Bajpai.

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Bahut shubkaamnaayen Varun sahab... humne suna... Varun looks at him. 95  96 97 98 99 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 57

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They walk into the storage room. Majumdar shows Bajpai around the room while Varun and the Zamindar watch. After a while the Zamindar walks out. Varun follows him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar stands by the balcony overlooking the courtyard, sipping his drink. Varun joins him.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Cigarette hai?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Ji...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Ek jalaao. Varun lights a cigarette and gives it to the Zamindar.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Beta, paise ki baat main nahin kar paoonga. Tum aur Majumdar hi sambhaalna. Varun nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
