dialogues.text: A list of items is prepared. The Zamindar goes through the list, then looks at the stuff being packed. Majumdar counts money and writes it on another list. The Zamindar signs the papers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar and Bajpai shake hands.

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Main chaloonga... abhi nikloonga to subah hote pahunchunga...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Bahut achcha... jaisi marzi aapki...

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Agar burra nahin maane to... (indicating Varun) Inko gaadi tak saath le jaane ki ijaazat chahoonga...  Lootera Shooting Draft vl

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Shauk se Bajpai sahab...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bajpai and Varun walk towards the car.

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Kya ho raha hai?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Sagai kar raha hoon...

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Phir uske baad? Varun doesn't say anything.

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Ghadhaa ghaas se rishta bana lega beta to khaayega kya...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Chacha kabhi na kabhi shaadi to karni hi hai na...

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Beta maine to nahin ki shaadi. Aur agar maine kar 1i hoti to tum sab ko kaise paalta...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Main jaanta hoon aapne hamein paala, nahlaaya dhulaaya, khilaya bada kiya... aapne jo kaha maine bhi kiya. Pahle aap se kabhi kuch nahin maanga...

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Bata sakoge tum usse ki tum kya karte ho yahan kyon aaye ho? Varun doesn't reply. They stop walking.

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Kal Suraj ko police ne maar diya Bareilly mein... Varun looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kaise?

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Usne bhaagne ki koshish ki... Varun digests this. Pg 58 100  101 102 103 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 59

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Do betiyan thi uski. Ek beta... tum to jaante ho... (beat) Ye zindagi hai hamaari. Jo hum jeete hain. Chaubees ghante. Dono peher. Poore saal. Ye dena chahte ho usse? Varun doesn't reply. Bajpai opens the car door.

dialogues.speaker: BAJPAI
dialogues.text: Baaki tum azaad ho. Tumhaari zindagi hai jo karna chahte ho karo... He gets in. The door closes. They look at each other. Bajpai drives off. Varun watches the car go. Music...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun looks at the photo of him and Pakhi. He stares at it for a while. After a while he gets up. We stay on the mirror and see him take his bags and walk out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the first light of the morning, Varun and Deb walk out of the haveli. Varun wheels his motorcycle away and out of the gate. When they're a fair distance away, Varun and Deb get on the bike. It starts and drives off. From the wheels of the bike...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wheels of the Zamindar's car, heading towards the temple site. It's morning now.  104 105 106 107 108 109 110 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 60

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi sits in front of the mirror, doing her eyes and hair. Behind her, Devyani supervises the sorting of the jewelle and clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar stands in front of the temple and watches the pooja service take place. All around, people are decking up the place with flowers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A maid servant puts alta on Pakhi's hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pandit pours milk on the idol. And to everyone's shock, the idol melts and collapses inwards. The pandit looks at the idol, then at the Zamindar. The Zamindar looks at the idol in horror. From under the ground, we see the idol being moved out. The Zamindar looks inside the gaping hole, then looks to the side, towards the area where the dig was happening. He walks towards the area and looks down into the trench. Realises what has happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar's car races back towards the haveli.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun and Deb reach a truck standing by the side of the road. They get off the motorcycle and hoist it into the back of the truck. Also in the back of the truck, the real gold idol, along with two smiling labourers from the site. Varun and Deb get into the truck. It moves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar walks through the haveli outhouse till he comes to Varun's room.  111 112 113 114 115 116 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 61 He opens the door and looks inside. It's empty. We see him from Pakhi's room. Inside the room, Pakhi drapes her sari on and looks in the mirror. Devyani stands behind her, very emotional.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck comes to a stop next to another car. Deb gets out of the truck and gets into the car. The driver of the car is Biswajeet Roy, the treasury department official. He smiles at Deb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi smiles at Devyani.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar's car races down the street again. It comes to a stop in front of the police station. He gets out of the car and sees Majumdar standing in fron of him, holding the briefcase. They look at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Majumdar and the Zamindar sit with the Police Inspector.

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Nakli. Sab ke sab nakli hai... ek note asli nahin hai... The Zamindar just watches in silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun and Deb enter a bar in Calcutta and walk to a table Sitting there, smoking a cigarette and reading a newspape is Bajpai. He looks at the boys, puts down his newspaper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi comes down the stairs, fully dressed up in her engagement finery. Watching her from the bottom of the stairs is the Zaminda She smiles at him, then notices his distraught face. Slowly, her smile fades.

dialogues.speaker: INTERVAL
dialogues.text: 112 114  117 118 119 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 62

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The courtyard of the haveli, barren of any life. Overlap a man's voice.

dialogues.speaker: BOSE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Un logon ka ek bahut bada antar- rajeeya giroh hai...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sitting across the Zamindar at his desk is BOSE, the poli inspector from the station. Majumdar is also there.

dialogues.speaker: BOSE
dialogues.text: Bajpai jinka sardar hai... jo khareeddar banke aaya tha... Across the table, the Zamindar looks at him, broken and exhausted.

dialogues.speaker: BOSE
dialogues.text: Varun Shrivastav ka asli naam kya hai kissi ko nahin pata... kabhi vah Narayan Maurya hota hai, kabhi Mohan Das... Debdas Mukherjee ke bhi kayi naam hai... Madan, Tony... aur pata nahin kaun kaun se... Without a word, the Zamindar gets up and walks out of the room. Majumdar looks at him go, then at Bose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar pours himself a drink. Majumdar stands behind.

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Daroga Babu sirf aapki madad karna chah rahe the... Not bothering to reply, the Zamindar puts down the bottle and turns to Majumdar.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Ek chhitthi likhiye hamari taraf se... Majumdar takes out a paper and pen, writes what the Zamindar dictates.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Ki Pakhi ka vivaah humne sthaagit kar diya hai... He goes to the grammaphone. He puts on a record.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 63

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Aur maafi maang leejiye... Music plays. The Zamindar closes his eyes, downs his drink. Majumdar looks at him. Outside the door, Pakhi looks at her father.

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Babu... The Zamindar looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: (pause) Jo mann mein aaye likh deejiye... aur hamein akela chhod dein aap... jjyiye... Majumdar gets up.

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Kal yadi samay nikaal kar ek nazar hisaab par... The Zamindar makes the music louder, cutting Majumdar off. Majumdar slowly walks out of the room, trying to fight tears. He passes Pakhi on the way. She walks in.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Baba... The Zamindar looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mujhe maf karo do...

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Maafi to mujhe maangni chahiye beti... ek cheez maangi tumne vah bhi nahin de paaya... He tries to smile.

dialogues.speaker: ZAMINDAR
dialogues.text: Kuch nahin to kam se kam tumhe hi saath le jaata... Pakhi looks down, on the verge of tears. The Zamindar pulls her close and hugs her. She cries softly.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 64

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Music from the library echoes through the haveli. Pakhi walks through the haveli corridors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar pours himself another stiff drink and listen to the music. After a while, a tear drops out of his eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi lies in bed. The sound of the music reaches her. She shuts her eyes tight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over the fields, the sun rises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi enters the library. She sees her father in his armchair, eyes closed. Coming towards him slowly, she sits on the chair opposite him... and keeps looking at his prone body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zamindar lies in a white sheet. Pakhi, Pishi Ma and Devyani sit near the body. Pakhi is the only one who doesn't cry. A tall rugged man stands in a corner, watching the proceedings. This is KN SINGH, the CID Inspector.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi takes a walk in the fields, alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi stands on the terrace, watching the clouds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi looks out of her room at the outhouse. Her POV: KN Singh stands before the door, inspecting everything. A few of his men look around. Overlap Majumdar's voice.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 65

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Sab kuch aapke naam chhodkar gaye hain...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi stands over her father's chair. Majumdar across the table.

dialogues.speaker: MAJUMDAR
dialogues.text: Kya karna hai beti? Pakhi looks at him. She then looks beyond him at the painting on the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi packs clothes and other things into a trunk. Devyani and Pishi Ma watch, silently. Pakhi closes the trunk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The painting burns. Pakhi watches the flames devour it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi's car makes it's way down the road, raising a cloud of dust. It passes KN Singh along the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi sits in the back of the car. It passes by the accident site, the place where Pakhi and Varun met for the first time. The driver looks at her in the rear-view mirror. She doesn't react.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi looks out of the window at the passing scenery. Day becomes night becomes day again. The landscape changes, from the plains to foothills to mountains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi gets out of the car, which is parked in front of a pretty mountain cottage, tucked away amongst the trees.  135 136 137 138 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 66 A woman in her thirties, SHYAMA, approaches from the hous and embraces Pakhi. They walk towards the cottage together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi walks into her bare room and straight towards the window that looks out to the garden. Her POV: A tree in the centre of the garden. It's green leaves sway gently in the breeze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On a desk lamp. The light is on. On this visual, a title card:

dialogues.speaker: "DALHOUSIE, 1953"
dialogues.text: Pakhi walks into the room and comes towards the desk. On the desk are blank sheets of paper. Pakhi looks at them. After a while, she switches off the light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freshly bathed, Pakhi sits at her desk by the window. In front of her, blank sheets of paper. Shyama cooks in the kitchen, watches Pakhi hunched over her papers. Pakhi brings the pen close to the paper, but doesn't writ anything. She leans back, looks at the paper. Leans forward again. Shyama watches her scribble. Pakhi writes something, then scratches it out. She rolls the paper into a ball and throws it behind her. It lands on the floor. After a while, another lands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lots of balls of paper on the floor. Shyama stands at the door, looking at the mess.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Didi khaana kha lo... Pakhi continues scribbling, ignoring her. Shyama comes forward and starts to pick up the pieces.  139 140 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 67

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Main kar loongi Shyama... unko chhod do... Shyama stands.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Main kya karoon phir?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tum jaao. Shyama walks out.

dialogues.speaker: LATER
dialogues.text: Pakhi scribbles, then rolls the paper into a ball and throws it on the floor. She starts coughing, which increases in frequency. She gets up and comes to the kitchen, opens the lid of a bowl. Hot soup is inside. Pakhi drinks it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi takes a walk through the forest lane. Around and above her, tall evergreens. It's very silent and peaceful. When she returns to the house, she sees a familiar figure standing, waiting for her. Inspector KN Singh. He takes off his hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shyama makes tea and watches from the kitchen as KN Singh and Pakhi sit opposite each other in the living room. He plays with his hat in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Pakhi ji, aap jitni achchi tarah Varun ko jaanti thi, koi aur nahin jaanta... Pakhi listens.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Aap agar madad nahin karengi to unke giroh ko pakadna mushkil ho jaayega... Pakhi doesn't say anything.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 68

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Jo Manikpur mein hua aapke saath vah kayi auron ke saath ho chuka hai. Iss giroh ne lakhon, karodon churayen hain zamindaron, raja maharajaon se... kai parivar khatam ho gaye hain, tod diye hain in logon ne. Sirf akele Roychowdhury sahab ki maut ke zimmedar nahin hai ye...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mere baba isiliye nahin marre kyonki unhe kissi ne loot liya. Vah... (pauses ) Varun ne unka dil toda tha. Unko dhokha diya tha. Vah us pe bahut vishwas karte the...

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Aur agar vah marre nahin hote to vah bhi yahi chahte ki Varun ko uske kiye ki sazaa mille... Pakhi looks away.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Aap madad karengi to hum unko pakad sakte hain...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mujhe usse badla nahin lena hai Singh sahab. Main sirf usse bhoolna chahti hoon... KN Singh looks at her for a while. When it seems like she's not going to say anything, he writes something on a piece of paper.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Agar aapko meri zaroorat pade ya aap ko kuch yaad aa jaaye jo aap bataana chahe... to operator ko bol ke aap yahaan phone kar sakti hain... Pakhi doesn't respond. He leaves the paper on the table and walks out. Pakhi watches him go, then gets up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's later in the day.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 69 Pakhi sits at the desk, looks at the blank sheet that seems to be mocking her. Shyama comes to the door.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Main jaoon? Pakhi doesn't respond.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Khaana dhak ke rakh liya hai. Thanda hone se pahle kha lena. Aapne subah se kuch nahin khaaya hai... Pakhi doesn't respond again. Shyama gives her one last look and walks out. Pakhi sits there for a while. She then picks up the pen. And she forces herself to write. She writes furiously, then looks at the paper, tosses it aside, picks up another. Writes, throws, writes. She finally picks up a paper and tears it to shreds. Then tears all the papers to shreds. She sits at the desk, breathing heavily. Silence. She turns on the radio. "Tadbeer se Bigdi Hui" plays. She looks at the radio. Turns it off angrily. Silence. The sound of the wind. She looks at the photo of her father. She suddenly gets up and walks through the cottage to the living room. She comes to where KN Singh was sitting and takes the piece of paper. She then comes to the telephone. She picks it up, dials, listens.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Inspector KN Singh se baat ho sakti hai... Police Station... Ji Pakhi Roychowdhury... She waits. KN Singh comes on the phone.

dialogues.speaker: 142F
dialogues.text: Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 70

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Usne ek baar bataaya tha ki Jandrighat ke raja ke mahal mein ek paanch sau saal puraani Ganesh ki sone ki murti hai... Music...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KN Singh listens. He then hangs up the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi hangs up the phone. She walks back into the room, sits at the desk. She stares outside the window. Music continues.

dialogues.speaker: DISSOLVE TO
dialogues.text: INT. JANDRIGHAT PALACE -- DAY 142c KN Singh stands in a corridor at the Jandrighat Palace. In front of him - the idol of Ganesh. A well-dressed MAN walks down the stairs. The RAJA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside the palace, KN Singh and the Raja talk. We don't hear what they say. As KN Singh explains, the Raja nods. They shake hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KN Singh is surrounded by POLICEMAN at the police station He explains stuff to them. Again, we don't hear what he's saying. They listen to him, rapt with attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A board is put up by TWO POLICEMEN outside Pakhi's house "Khaali guest house kiraye pe uplabd hai".

dialogues.speaker: 142L
dialogues.text: Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 71 Shyama looks, not understanding. She looks at Pakhi, who doesn't explain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KN Singh puts up names on a board in the police station - Bajpai, Varun, Deb, Biswajeet Roy. The local Dalhousie INSPECTOR stands with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi eats a tiny bite of food. Then leaves the plate mostly untouched and goes inside the room. Shyama watches her go, looks at the plate of food.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Photos are taken of the idol at Jandrighat Palace. KN Singh supervises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi sits on her desk, not bothering to write, just looking out. Shyama watches her from the door, concerned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He writes a letter by hand, seals it. Addresses it to "The Editor, The Statesman". He hands it to BAJRANGI, a constable.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Bajpai at a tea shop in Calcutta. He reads the papers. The Statesman. He sees an article that interests him - a photo of the idol with a headline "famous idol to be moved to Museum". He puts the paper down on a table. Across him, Varun and Deb.

dialogues.speaker: 142L
dialogues.text: 143 144 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 72 The montage ends. The tree outside Pakhi's window. It's leaves sway in the breeze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The same tree, the same shot. Now the tree is shedding leaves. Dark clouds have gathered around the house. Pakhi sits on a bench outside, huddled under a shawl. She stares into the distance. The wind blows, swirling leaves around. Shyama watches her from the door of the cottage and calls out to her, but Pakhi can't hear her through the wind. Pakhi coughs violently, covering her mouth with her hand. She looks at the hand. Blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi lies on her side while an elderly doctor, DR. TSERING, listens to her breathing through a stethoscope. Shyama watches tensely from the door. Dr. Tsering pulls the stethoscope away.

dialogues.speaker: DR. TSERING
dialogues.text: Congestion badhta jaa raha hai... Pakhi looks out of the window.

dialogues.speaker: DR. TSERING
dialogues.text: Pakhi... meri baat sun rahi ho? Pakhi nods.

dialogues.speaker: DR. TSERING
dialogues.text: Kissi garam jagah jaakar rahna chahiye tumhe... zyaada jeeyogi... Pakhi closes her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Marna to hai hi ek din doctor uncle... kya karoongi ji kar?

dialogues.speaker: DR. TSERING
dialogues.text: Ek aur kitaab likh sakogi...  145 146 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 73 Pakhi opens her eyes. Her POV: A tree outside the window, gently shedding leave

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Jo likh rahi hoon, ussi mein hi saari zindagi khatam ho jaati hai... She keeps watching the tree.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Tsering talks to Shyama outside.

dialogues.speaker: DR. TSERING
dialogues.text: TB hai... jaanleva hai... kitni bhi zidd kare akele mat chhodna.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Hum to lad lad kar ro ro kar thak jaate hain. Jab vah akele rehna chahti hai to baahar dhakel deti hai, sunti kahan hai?

dialogues.speaker: DR. TSERING
dialogues.text: Tum bhi vaapas unko andar dhakel diya karo... aur kaadha pilaate raho.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi watches the tree shed another leaf. Shyama puts some food on Pakhi's bed side table, along with a cup.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Kaadha pee lo didi. Doctor sahab ne bola hai... Pakhi ignores her.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Kaadha pee lo.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Main pee loongi, mez par rakh do.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Abhi peeyo, hamaare saamne.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (snaps) Bola na mez par rakh do, pee loongi... Shyama, stunned by the outburst, walks away, hurt.

dialogues.speaker: LATER
dialogues.text: 147 148 149 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 74 Shyama washes dishes in the kitchen, crying at the same time. Pakhi comes behind her and puts her arms around her.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mujhe maaf kar do. Shyama wipes her tears, nodding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The clouds have got darker. The tree sheds leaves in the breeze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi sits by the window, looking at the tree. The radio plays. A newscaster drones on about possible snowfall. Pakhi watches the tree and all sounds slowly disappear from the soundtrack. She notices the swaying branches, the way the leaves fall off and float their way to the ground. She stays in this reverie till Shyama puts a hand on her shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Koi do jann aaye hain... Pakhi doesn't say anything.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Kya karoon?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Dikha do... kiraaya pahle le lena. Shyama leaves. Pakhi comes to the back window and looks out. Her POV: Shyama leads two men to the outhouse - Varun and Deb. They look slightly different from the last time we'v seen them. Varun's stubble has grown and Deb wears glasses.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (to Shyama) Aur kaun rehta hai yahaan?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door to the outhouse opens and Shyama walks in. Varun and Deb follow her.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 75

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Maalkin... uski tabiyat theek nahin hai... She looks around the room.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Ye leejiye... bistar hai, bijli bhi hai, lekin thoda chhota hai.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Jo bhi hai theek hai, poore shahar mein bas yahi ek bacha hai, koi bhi jagah khaali nahin hai... aisa kyon?

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Aisa nahin hai... ek hotel hai, dharamshaala hai...

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Sab bhari hai.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Khaane ka kya hai?

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Subah bol deejiyega. Kyonki hum to yahaan rahte nahin. Door shaher mein rahte hain. She goes to the door.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Hum jaayen?

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Aap jaao.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Hamaara naam nahin poocha aapne...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Aapne bhi to hamara nahin poocha. Shyama smiles.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Hum Shyama hain...

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Hum Tony Jaalwaala.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Aur main Vijay.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Aur isse baat pe hum chalte hain...  150 151 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 76

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi watches through the window as Varun and Deb walk out of the gate. Suddenly, her phone rings. Outside the gate, Varun hears it ringing. He looks back at the house. Pakhi is looking straight at him but he can't see her. Pakhi picks up the phone, still looking outside.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Main Singh bol raha hoon, Inspector KN Singh...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Ji...

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Giroh ka sardar Bajpai Kalkatta mein pakda gaya.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Oh...

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Aapko saavdhan karne ke liye phone kiya tha. Bajpai ne kuboola hai ki vah dono Dalhousie mein pahunch chuke hain... rahne ki jagah dhoondenge. Humne saari jagah jahaan par log rah sakte hain band karva di hai. Kabhi na kabhi aapke paas pahunchenge... jaise hi pahunchenge aap mujhe phone kar deejiyega...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Ji... She puts the phone down, looks out of the window. Sees Varun and Deb receding into the distance. She keeps watching them. Music...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KN lights his cigarette and looks at his men.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Aap log phail jaao...  152 153 154 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 77

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun and Deb are escorted through a corridor of the pala by a servant. Around them, artifacts of all kinds. They approach the idol of Ganesh. Both of them watch it. The Raja walks down the stairs. Varun looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A man sits in front of KN Singh.

dialogues.speaker: MAN
dialogues.text: Do jan aaye the Hotel pe. Humne unko bhej diya bol ke ki jagah nahi hai...

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Chaubees Pachchis saal ke? Ek dubla sa tha, Dev Anand type...

dialogues.speaker: MAN
dialogues.text: Bilkul... KN Singh looks at the Station Inspector.

dialogues.speaker: INSPECTOR
dialogues.text: Pata nahin sahab... hamein to koi khabar nahin...

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Hotel vaala bolta hai do jann aaye the, yah bol rahe hain... agar vah kahin nahin rah rahe hain, to gaye kahaan? Overlap the Raja's voice:

dialogues.speaker: RAJA
dialogues.text: Aap museum se aaye hain? Dilli se?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Raja sits with Deb and Varun in the verandah. He reads an official letter from the National Museum.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Ji.

dialogues.speaker: RAJA
dialogues.text: Moorti le ke kaise jayenge?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Truck mein le ke jayenge. Dilli se truck nikal chuke hain.  155 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 78

dialogues.speaker: RAJA
dialogues.text: Aur security?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Aap uski chinta bilkul na karein. Kam se kam chhey log Delhi se bhejey gayein hain, jo moorti ke saath saath yahan se Dilli tak jayenge. Aur agar aap chahein, to aapka koi aadmi bhi saath jaa sakta hai... The Raja nods.

dialogues.speaker: RAJA
dialogues.text: Main aur kya kar sakta hoon aapke liye?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Humein iske liye ek baksa banwana padega... jiske liye hum kal a key napai kar lenge agar aapko asuvidha na ho...

dialogues.speaker: RAJA
dialogues.text: Bas?

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Aap bolo to thahar bhi jaate hain... The Raja laughs. Deb smiles.

dialogues.speaker: RAJA
dialogues.text: Kal se aa jaao... aaj hum sab ko khabar karva dete hain ki aap log aa rahe ho... He points to his man standing against the wall.

dialogues.speaker: RAJA
dialogues.text: Yah rahenge aap ke saath... The get up.

dialogues.speaker: RAJA
dialogues.text: Kahin chhodvaana ho to hamari gaadi chhod degi...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Nahin uski koi zaroorat nahin, bahut bahut dhanyavaad aapka...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun and Deb emerge from the palace. They walk towards the gate, past the garden and a working gardener.  156 157 158 159 160 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 79 The gardener looks at them. It's the man we know as Biswajeet Roy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Raja picks up a phone, dials a number.

dialogues.speaker: RAJA
dialogues.text: Hello... hahn vahi dono the...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KN Singh puts the phone down. Looks at the Inspector.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Aap ke paas kitne log hain?

dialogues.speaker: INSPECTOR
dialogues.text: Baarah...

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Sab ke paas hathyar hai?

dialogues.speaker: INSPECTOR
dialogues.text: Donali hai...

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Mujhe sab chahiye...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun dials a number. It rings. He waits as it carries on ringing. He hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Phone utha nahin rahe...

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: So rahe honge...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Bajpai uncle sote nahin hai...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the POV of a pair of binoculars: Varun and Deb emerge from the post office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They sit at a table. A boy gives them tea.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kuch gadbad hai...

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Koi gadbad nahin hai...

dialogues.speaker: AND
dialogues.text: 162 163 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 80 Deb looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun and Deb come out of the tea shop and start walking down the street. Unseen by them, two men sitting outside the tea shop spli up. One man follows them at a distance, the other enters an alley. The alley man comes to the end of the alley and enters a shop, looks at KN Singh.

dialogues.speaker: ALLEY MAN
dialogues.text: Sahab... vah log vahaan se chale gaye...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Varun and Deb carry on walking. Behind them, two more men fall in line. From a parallel alley, KN Singh tracks them. Varun walks, when a peculiar sound hits his ears, a rhythmic metallic-like sound. He turns while walking. The sound stops. His POV: a normal market scene. People talking, walking. He notices a man standing outside a shop, talking to someone inside. The man wears civilian clothes. Varun looks down at his shoes. The man starts walking forward again. The same rhythmic metallic sound. Varun looks in front and quickens his pace. The pace of the rhythm increases, tapping away on the cobblestone street. KN Singh keeps pace with Varun. He takes out his gun. Varun leans close to Deb.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Hamara peecha ho raha hai... Deb looks into an alley while walking, sees a figure tracking them. He looks up, sees a man dart into a balcony.

dialogues.speaker: DEBDAS
dialogues.text: Poori police force baahar hai hamare liye. 161 162 163  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 81

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Tum daayen jaao, main baayen nikalta hoon. Deb and Varun come to a corner and suddenly go different ways. The policemen stop in their tracks. KN Singh looks, sees Deb turning into his alley a few feet in front. He indicates for one man to follow Varun and goes after Deb himself. The Varun-following cop takes the lane that Varun took, coming out on the other side. He sees Varun running down the lane. The cop raises his whistle to his lips. KN Singh hears the whistle blowing. So does Deb. He turns around. Their eyes meet. Deb sees the gun in his hand and ducks into an alley. KN Singh runs after him. Music... The chase begins. Varun runs through an alley, comes out the other side and sees two policemen converging on him. He runs back into the alley and takes a narrow staircase. The cops follow him. Varun enters a house, runs through it till he comes to the balcony. Looks out - no cops on the street. He jumps on a nearby roof, and then on the ground. Starts running again. KN Singh looks for Deb in the many alleys, can't see him anywhere. He passes an alley, and then comes back. He sees Deb running at the other end. He follows him. Varun runs down an alley, hides in a doorway. He sees policemen running in another alley, in one direction. He runs in the other direction, almost bangs into KN Singh. He turns at the last moment and slams into an open doorwa KN Singh hears the sound and turns. Varun runs up the dark staircase and hides. KN Singh comes to the open doorway, looks inside. He can't see anything. Without warning, and before he can raise his gun, Varun jumps out on him. They tumble to the ground. Varun manages to kick his gun away, picks it up, points it at KN Singh.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 82 He sees other cops coming down the alley towards them.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: (shouting at the cops ) Goli mat chalaana! The cops stop, guns raised.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Varun... aatmasamarpan kar do... Varun looks at him, then at the waiting police, comes forward and kicks KN Singh in the stomach. KN Singh doubles over. The cops shoot. Varun ducks out of the alley. He runs for a while and then stops at a street corner, looks either side. No cops. He runs down the street and sees a policeman coming towards him. He raises his gun. The policeman looks away and ducks into an alley. Varun hears footsteps behind him getting closer, whips around and fires his gun... Straight into Deb's chest. Deb, surprise on his face, goes down holding his chest. Varun looks at him in shock. He keeps looking at him and doesn't notice police coming down the alley in front of him. They shoot. Varun takes a bullet in his side. He falls to the ground, right in front of Deb's body. He fires back at the cops blindly, hitting one of them, and not noticing. The cops back away. Varun looks at Deb's face. Still some life in the eyes. They keep looking at each other till Deb's eyes close. Varun runs down the alley into a dark doorway. He hides and watches as the police come down the other end. They gather around Deb's dead body. Varun holds his hands to his mouth, tears coming into his eyes. His wound bleeds. KN Singh and all the policemen look at Deb's dead body. Varun takes the opportunity to escape. On Deb's dead face, snowflakes fall. KN Singh looks up. Heavy snow. He curses under his breath.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 83

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi sits by the window, looking up at the snow falling. Shyama comes to the door.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Didi main jaa rahi hoon... Pakhi doesn't reply.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A crowd gathers around Deb's dead body. KN Singh and the police try to move them away, but it turning out to be difficult. The Inspector comes to KN Singh.

dialogues.speaker: INSPECTOR
dialogues.text: Sahab... Bajrangi ki haalat bahut kharaab hoti jaa rahi hai... doctor ko bulva bheja hai... KN Singh nods, his eyes scanning the crowd for any sign of Varun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun waits under the awning of a shop, a shawl covering him, looking across the street. His POV: Dr. Tsering locks up the clinic door and leaves in a hurry, a constable with him. Varun waits till he walks away and is out of sight, then crosses the road. He tests the lock on the door, then looks right and left, takes out his gun. Hits the lock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi comes out on the porch of the house. Wind and snow swirl around. She covers herself with her shawl. Coughs. And coughs again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shyama tries to get a look through the crowd at the sourc of interest but is unable to. The police cover Deb's body with a sheet. Dr. Tsering crouches over the body of the injured constable.  169 170 171 172 173 174 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 84

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun lights a match and looks around the dark clinic. Opens a cupboard and finds the doctor's instruments. And a battery operated torch. He puts on the torch and leaves it on the doctor's table, then sits on the bed. Lifts his shirt. Blood everywhere. He feels with his fingers, flinches with the pain. He picks up the doctor's forceps, steels himself and then inserts them into his side. He begins to cry, partly from the pain, partly from the memory of Deb's death. He manages to pull the bullet out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KN Singh and the policemen comb through the alleys, with torchlights and lanterns, searching every alley and doorway. A constable calls out to KN Singh. He walks over. The constable points out to something. KN Singh looks. His POV: Blood on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun wipes his tears and dials a number on the doctor's phone. The phone keeps ringing. Varun slams it down after a while.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KN Singh walks through the street hurriedly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun dials another number. Nobody picks up this time either. He then notices the something on the doctor's desk, in the light of the torch - a file, with Pakhi's name on it. Music...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KN Singh approaches the doctor's door. He sees that it's open, and the lock has been broken.  175 176 177 178 179 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 85 He gets his gun out and opens the door. It's completely dark inside. Keeping the gun pointed, he slowly enters the clinic and switches on a light. The clinic is empty. KN Singh notices the blood, and the bullet. He curses again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KN Singh comes out of the clinic. The station inspector walks up to him.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Usse goli lagi hai aur vah zyaada door nahin jaa sakta. Vah shahar mein hai, ghayal hai... He walks on, then turns again.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Chaaron taraf parcha chapva kar baanto, deevaron par chipakvaado. Uska huliya kaisa dikhta hai, sab... mujhe ye aadmi chahiye. Dhoondte raho usse jab tak mil nahin jaata ya mar nahin jaata...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun walks through the forest lane, now covered with snow. He stumbles and falls, his flashlight wobbling all over the place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi comes into the room, a coughing bout in progress. She slumps on the bed, breathing very heavily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun reaches the cottage gate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi hears the bell tinkling. She turns and looks toward the door, waiting, breathing very heavy. After an almost interminable wait, Varun comes through the door. They look at each other. Hate on both their faces.  180 181 182 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 86

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Police ko tumne bulaaya tha... She keeps staring at him. He at her. He comes closer to her.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Police ko tumne bulaaya tha... She doesn't say anything. Keeps looking at him, breathing hard. He lifts her up violently. She's breathing hard, staring into his eyes. He stares back at her. She closes her eyes, goes limp in his arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KN Singh stands in the middle of the street, an isolated figure in the snow. The Inspector walks up to him.

dialogues.speaker: INSPECTOR
dialogues.text: Bajrangi nahin raha... KN Singh looks into the distance, his eyes steely. He lights a cigarette.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun tries to dial a number from Pakhi's phone. It keeps ringing. He slams the phone down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi wakes up with a start, sits up in bed and looks around. She notices the syringe lying on the table next to her. She comes to the dining room, sees Varun standing by the window, looking out. He turns to her.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 87

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mera dost mara hai tumhaari vajah se... itni aasaani se marne nahin doonga tumhe...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tumko bhi kissi ki maut ka gam ho sakta hai mujhe pata nahin tha...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Tumhe bahut kuch pata nahin hai.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tum jaao Varun.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mujhe chhupne ki jagah chahiye.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Vah tumhe yahaan nahin milegi. He doesn't say anything.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Chale jaao nahin to police ko telephone kar doongi.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Tum nahin karogi.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Yah tumhaari galatfahmi hai...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Karna hota to bahut pahle kar chuki hoti. They stare at each other. She walks towards the phone. He goes to cut her off. She tries to break through. He physically pulls her away from the phone. She breaks free and turns on him, very angry. Just then, Shyama enters the house. Varun immediately pulls out his gun and points it at her. She stares at the gun in shock. Looks at Pakhi, who's looking at Varun, breathing hard. Silence. Shyama takes a step towards the open door behind her.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Darwaaza band kar do Shyama... Shyama stands there, frozen, looking at the gun in Varun' hand.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 88

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Aap band kar rahe ho ya main kar doon? Shyama shuts the door.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Police vaalon ne roka tumhe, kuch poocha tumse? No reply.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Koi savaal kiya, mere baare mein?

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Nahin...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mujhe bahlaane ki koshish mat karna.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (cutting in) Tumhaari tarah vah jhoot nahin bolti. Varun looks at Pakhi, then back at Shyama.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Aapki tasveer saare bazaar mein lagi hai. Aapko dhoonda jaa raha hai. Ek havaldar ki hatya ka aarop hai aap pe... vah kah rahe hain ki aap ne apne dost ko bhi maara... Pakhi looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tum ne Deb ko maar dala? He puts the gun down. Looks at Pakhi.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Aapko dekhte hi goli maar dene ka aadesh hai... Pakhi turns and walks off towards the room.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: (to Varun) Kaun ho aap? Pakhi turns at the door.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Yah Bhagwaan Vishnu ke avataar hai Shyama... inke das roop aur naam hai... She walks in. Varun follows her.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 89

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Maine Deb ko jaanbooch ke nahin maara. Vah mera dost tha, mere bhai jaisa.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aur vah hawaldar?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Vah mujhpe goli chala rahe the. Main unpe. Uss ek hawaldar ko goli lagi vah marr gaya... Pakhi doesn't say anything.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Main chor hoon. Hatyara nahin...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mujhe tumhaari kissi baat pe vishwaas nahin hota Varun...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Main sach bol raha hoon...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Uss samay bhi sach bol sakte the, bahut kuch bach jaata...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Tum na to mujhe jaanti ho Pakhi, na mere baare mein.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Hahn, mujhe to tumhaara asli naam bhi nahin pata...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Deb, Bajpai uncle... main unko dhokha nahin de sakta tha. Unhone paala hai mujhe, main aur Deb paida hue the, tab se... tumhaare liye unka vishwaas uthaakar taalaab mein nahin dooba sakta tha...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mera vishwaas dooba sakte the, mere pyaar ko dhokha de sakte the...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Tumhe samajh mein nahin aayega, tumne kuch dekha hi nahin hai... Chaardeewaari mein, aisho-aaraam mein rahi ho saari zindagi... tumhaari samajh mein nahin aayega... He walks out of the room, straight into Shyama holding his gun to his face. He looks at her.  183 184 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 90

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Khaali hai... Shyama pulls the trigger. It clicks. Varun doesnt flinch. He takes he gun from her hand. Shows her the barrel.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Le jaayiye usse apne saath... rakh leejiye... masala kootne ke kaam aayega... He walks out of the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun comes out to the gate of the cottage, looks down the path. Nobody there. He comes back into the house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shyama stands with Pakhi.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Didi police ko telephone kar doon?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tum apna kaam karo Shyama...

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Aap kaahe usse bacha rahi hai? Pahle se jaanti hai?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Hahn... tum jaao...

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Lekin...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Ye mera kuch nahin bigaad sakte... Shyama looks at Pakhi, walks out. Passes Varun who makes his way to the telephone, dials a number. While he waits for someone to answer he looks inside Pakhi's room, sees her sitting at the desk, looking out of the window. And it's then that he notices the Zamindar's photo. He keeps looking at it. A man picks up the phone.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Nandan... Varun bol raha hoon...  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 91

dialogues.speaker: NANDAN
dialogues.text: Varun... jahaan bhi ho gaayab ho jaao. Police ne sabko pakad liya hai, poora giroh khatam ho gaya hai...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Nandan... Nandan... Deb mar gaya hai. Mujhe bhi goli lagi hui hai.. Mujhe yahaan se nikaalo... Bajpai uncle phone nahin utha rahe...

dialogues.speaker: NANDAN
dialogues.text: Bajpai uncle pakde gaye... Varun is silent. Nandan carries on.

dialogues.speaker: NANDAN
dialogues.text: Ram aur Gupta ji ko to goli mar di hai... Lucknow mein, Rai Bareilly mein, Bastar mein, har koi pakda gaya hai... inko sab kuch pata tha...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mujhe yahaan se nikaalo Nandan...

dialogues.speaker: NANDAN
dialogues.text: Kal milo mujhe Lakkadmandi mein, subah aath baje...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Theek hai.

dialogues.speaker: NANDAN
dialogues.text: Samay se pahunch jaana. Main ek minute intezaar karoonga bas... abhi ghadi milaao... Varun looks at his watch.

dialogues.speaker: NANDAN
dialogues.text: Abhi baj rahe hain saat taintees...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Varun hangs up the phone. Turns and looks towards Pakhi's room. She's looking at the tree. He slowly walks into Pakhi's room.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Main kal chala jaoonga... She doesn't say anything.  185 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 92

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Aaj raat yahin rukoonga... tum chaaho to police to phone kar sakti ho...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mujhe yadi phone karna hoga to tumse poochne ki zaroorat nahin hai...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Main bas kah raha hoon...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mat kaho... Silence.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Zamindar babu...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (cuts in) Guzar gaye...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kaise?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tumne unhe maar daala. Jaise tumne Deb ko maara... tumhaari galti nahin thi... Varun looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mujhe...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tumhe unki maut ka koi afsos nahin. He doesn't say anything. Turns around and walks out, shutting the door behind him. As soon as the door closes, Pakhi's composure collapses and she bursts into tears. Varun stands outside the door and listens to her cry. His eyes meet Shyama's. He walks out of the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun lies in bed, staring at the ceiling. The door opens and Shyama comes in with a tray. He sits up.  186 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 93

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Khaana... didi ne nahin bheja hai, hum khud laaye hain... Varun smiles at her.

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Hum ghar jaa rahe hain. Police ko kuch nahin bataayenge... bas aap didi ko kuch mat karna... Varun nods. Shyama leaves. Music...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sits at the desk, writing furiously. Varun watches her from the door.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Sab kuch peeche chhodkar aayi thi main yahaan, sab bhool jaane... pata nahin kyon tum vaapas aa gaye aur pata nahin kyon maine aane diya... kyon jab tum so rahe hote ho to main gala ghont ke maar nahin daalti... mazaa aa raha hai tumhe dekh kar ki main kis haalat mein hoon... She looks up at the tree.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Vah ped dekh rahe ho...

dialogues.speaker: LATER
dialogues.text: In the room. Pakhi is sleeping. Varun reads what she has written. The last light of day outside the window.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Usse raat din taakti rahti hoon jaise vah koi tota ho... meri zindagi hai... roz uske patte girte hue dekhti rahti hoon... Varun looks at the tree.

dialogues.speaker: LATER
dialogues.text: It's night now. Varun sits on the floor, leaning against a wall, watching Pakhi sleep.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Jis din vah ped nanga hua aur jis waqt uski aakhri patti girri, main (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 187 188 189 190 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 94

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: apni aakhri saans loongi... yahaan iss haalat mein la chhoda hai tumne mujhe...

dialogues.speaker: LATER
dialogues.text: The first light of the morning. Pakhi's awake. She hears Varun get up and walk out of the room.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Yah jaankar shaayad thodi sharam aaye tumhe jeene mein... lekin mujhe pata hai tumhe kya farak padhta hai... tum usse bhi apne aap ko chhupa loge... Pakhi turns to look at the door. Varun's gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun steps out with his bag. He looks at the tree, still shedding leaves. He starts walking, towards the gate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi hears the tinkling of the gate bell. She closes her eyes. SONG # 3 begins...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun walks through the forest path, now totally covered with snow. The song echoes the thoughts in his head. He holds the wound at his side. Grimaces as he walks. He walks on, troubled, thinking, and comes to a group of cottages, all abandoned. Everyone has left for the winter In the distance stands a man, looking at his watch. It's Nandan, or the man we know as Biswajeet Roy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi looks at the tree. We realise that this is the very first visual of the film The leaf breaks off the tree and floats to the ground. Pakhi watches it all the way. As it hits the ground...  191 192 193 194 195 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 95

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun slows down, contemplative. After a few more steps, he stops in the middle of the road, his head hung. He looks back towards the way he came. Then looks at the path to freedom, at Nandan waiting. He thinks for a few seconds, then turns around and walks back. The SONG reaches a crescendo and ends as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun walks into the room, looks at Pakhi's back.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Baahar abhi bhi bahut garam hai.. Mujhe kuch din aur yahaan rehna padega... She doesn't reply. He walks into the kitchen, pours water into a utensil. Looks around, sees the stove, starts pumping it. Pakhi hears the sound. Varun lights a fire.

dialogues.speaker: LATER
dialogues.text: He brings her a cup of tea.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Chai... She doesn't look at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A snowstorm in progress. Snow swirls around. The wind blows ominously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi lies in bed, asleep and shivering. Varun walks in and sees her. He sees the tea lying cold and untouched. He looks at the fireplace. No fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun comes out, holding his coat tight around himself.  196 197 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 96 He walks around the cottage till he sees a pile of firewood. Holding the axe kept next to the pile, he lifts it, and then puts it down, groaning in pain and holding his side. Taking a few deep breaths, he grabs the handle of the axe, and with a massive effort and a roar, smashes the axe down on the wood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun comes inside the cottage with the wood. He places it near the fireplace and comes to Pakhi again. She's still shivering. He touches her forehead. Pulls his hand away and looks at her face.

dialogues.speaker: LATER
dialogues.text: The fire burns. Varun sits by Pakhi's bedside. He dips a cloth in water and puts it on her forehead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tree has a few leaves remaining. Pakhi sits on her chair, looking at the tree. Varun walks up to her with tea again. He gives it to her. She shakes her head. He tries again. She throws it across the room. It smashes against a wall. He looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mukhe tumhaari chai nahin peeni...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: To kya karna hai? Marna hai?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Hahn marna hai... tum jaao yahaan se aur mujhe marne do shaanti se...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Shyama ke hote hue shaanti se marna mushkil hoga... He goes to pick up the broken pieces.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kya jataane ki koshish kar rahe ho tum?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kuch nahin...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Jab karna chahiye tha tab...  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 97

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Bhaag gaya tha... aur log the tumhaare chaaron taraf...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mujhe pata hai tumhe kya chahiye...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kya?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Ek baar se mann nahin bhara phir se...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: (cutting in) Kya karoon... tum to hi itni haseen...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (getting angry) Main mazak nahin kar rahi hoon.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mujhe to aata hi nahin mazaak karna...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tum jaao yahaan se.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Pakhi.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (screams ) Mera naam mat lo...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Cheekho mat malkin... vaapas daura pad jaayega.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Yahi to chahte ho tum, ki mujhe daura pad jaaye.. She coughs.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Dekha...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tum...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Chhup! She wheezes, the familiar sound of an impending asthma attack.  198 199 200 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 98 Varun walks towards her. She puts a hand out to stop him, and looks at him through huge wheezing breaths, defiant. He looks at her, getting angry while her breathing gets worse, then starts rummaging through the room for her medicine. He opens a drawer and finds the syringe. He loads it and comes towards her. She tries to fight him off. He grabs her arms but she still struggles, breathing heavily all the time. Finally grabbing both her arms in one hand, he gives her the shot in the arm, and holds her while her breathing comes back to normal. She shakes him off and slumps in bed. He sits on the floor against a wall, holding his injured side. They look at each other, she with hatred, he with anger. The phone begins ringing, but neither of them make any move to answer it. It rings on a few times, then stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi lies in bed. Varun sits against the wall. The anger still simmers.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kabhi kabhi to sochti hoon tumhe jaan se maar daaloon...itni nafrat hoti hai mujhe tumse... lekin itni taakat nahin bachi hai mujh mein... mujhe bas ab mukti chahiye Varun... tumse, apne aap se, iss zindagi se... sabse... Varun watches her. She watches the tree.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun raises the axe to cut wood. After a few chops, he takes a break and looks at the tree. A handful of leaves left. He keeps watching the tree.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi sleeps, shivering. Varun rummages through his bag. Finding what he wants, he zips it up and walks out of the door into the darkness  201 202 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 99 We move towards the fireplace. The fire burns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We move away from the fireplace as Varun puts another log into it. He sits next to the fireplace and warms his hands. His hair and clothes are wet. He turns to look at Pakhi. She sleeps. He lifts his shirt and looks at his side. Blood seeps through the bandage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KN Singh talks on the phone.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Mujhe pata hai Namita, Bhagwat ki chhuttiyan chal rahi hai... kya karoon... nahin mujhe usse nahin baat karni... hello... He pauses.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Hahn bete, kaise ho? Main Dalhousie mein hoon... nahin tum yahaan nahin aa sakte... main yahaan kyon hoon? He smiles.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: KN Singh watches the photo of Varun put up on the wall. The Inspector stands behind him.

dialogues.speaker: INSPECTOR
dialogues.text: Aap so jaao...

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Sota hoon to sapne mein aata hai... chidhaata hai saala... tum so jaao, main jaga hoon...

dialogues.speaker: INSPECTOR
dialogues.text: Usse goli lagi hai, ho sakta hai mar gaya go.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Marega to kissi na kissi ko to dikhega... aur yadi kissi aise jagah mara hai jahaan dikh nahin sakta to insaani shaeer hai... marta ha to sadta hai... sadta ha to badboo aati hai...  203 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 100

dialogues.speaker: INSPECTOR
dialogues.text: Hahn lekin baraf bhi to gir rahi hai. Usmein boo nahin aati... KN Singh looks at the inspector. Suddenly, the power goes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun lights a candle and sits propped against the wall. Pakhi lies in bed, her back to him.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tumne kabhi bhi mujhse pyaar kiya tha? He doesn't reply.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Mere saath hi aisa kyon kiya?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Jaanbooch ke kuch nahin kiya maine... She waits.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Main jab Manikpur aaya tha mujhe nahin pata tha tumse takkar hogi... jab pahli baar tumhe dekha tha to thodi der ke liye laga tha main Mar gaya hoon... Insert: Varun lying in the ditch. Opening his eyes. Pakhi.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Phir mujhe nahin pata tha tum Zamindar babu ki beti niklogi. Insert: Varun watching Pakhi come down the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Main chori karne aaya tha... aur parivar mein ghusna isiliye pada kyonki pata karna tha kya kya hai jo chori kiya ja sakta hai... ye mera kaam hai... (pauses ) Tha... Insert: Varun reading poetry with Pakhi. Painting classes Hands touching. The painting, completed.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Jab maine dekha ki tum mujhse pyaar karne lagi ho to maine kayee baar rokne ki koshish ki...  204 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 101 Insert: Varun and Pakhi fight at the temple site. Pakhi cries. Varun watches the window.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Lekin nahin roka gaya... Insert: They make love.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Phir Bajpai uncle to pata chala... unhone... Insert: Bajpai talking to Varun near the car.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Bola main kaun hoon, kya karta hoon... tumhe pata chala to tum kya phir bhi pyaar kar sakogi... Pakhi looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tumne abhi bhi mere savaal ka jawaab nahin diya... tumne kabhi bhi mujhse pyaar kiya tha? He looks away, doesn't answer.

dialogues.speaker: LATER
dialogues.text: Varun applies the cold compress to Pakhi's forehead. The phone starts ringing. Varun looks at it. When he looks at Pakhi, her eyes are open. They look at each other. She closes her eyes. He puts the cold compress on her forehead. She takes it off, hands it back to him and turns around. He puts the cloth back in the bowl and walks out. She watches him go. The phone keeps ringing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The window of the cottage, frosted over. Pakhi walks towards it and wipes the pane. She looks outside. The tree has a single leaf left. Music... She keeps watching it, trying to make sense of what it means.  205 206 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 102 She comes out of her room to the kitchen and sees Varun outside the house, standing by the logs of wood, his back to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Varun leans on the logs don't see. He hears a sound behind dropping the paintbrush pocket. Pakhi looks at him. He A gentle breeze blows.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUOUS 205
dialogues.text: of wood, painting something we him and immediately turns around, and putting something in his looks back at her. The snow has stopped. Before she can say anything, both of them hear the gate bell tinkle.

dialogues.speaker: MORNING 206
dialogues.text: Pakhi looks out of her door and sees KN Singh walking up, two policemen alongside. She looks to the back door. No sign of Varun. KN Singh steps on the porch and looks at Pakhi.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Andar aa sakta hoon? She opens the door. He He looks at her. enters.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Main seedha kaam ki baat par aata hoon...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Ji...

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Aap ne usse dekha? Ya Milli?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kisse?

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Varun...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Main usse kyon miloongi? Hahn, aapne bola tha vah aane vaala hai... aaya nahin... guesthouse khaali hai... board abhi bhi baahar laga hai...  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 103

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Phir bhi vah aapke guesthouse mein rah raha tha...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Nahin... She doesn't reply. They stare at each other. He walks towards the back door. He stops.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Main andar dekh sakta hoon?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Warrant hai aapke paas?

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Abhi to nahin hai... kal laakar dikha sakta hoon...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: To phir kal hi aayiyega Singh sahab andar dekhne... They look at each other for a while.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Aap usse bachaane ki koshish kyon kar rahi hain?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Main kissi ko bachaane ki koshish nahin kar rahi hoon...

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Ye vahi aadmi hai jiski vajah se aapke pitaji ki maut hui, aur hamaare ek havaldaar ki... goli maar ke hatya ki hai usne... Pakhi doesn't reply.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Jiss din pakda jaayega ya to usse phaansi par latka denge ya utha kar jail mein phenk denge, baaki saaari zindagi ke liye... KN Singh walks to the door.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Kal main vaapas aaoonga warrant ke saath, aur dus police vaale bhi honge mere saath... jinko main baahar chhodkar jaa raha hoon... agar usne raat ko yahaan se bhaagne ki koshish ki to ye usse goli maar (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 207 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 104

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: denge, nahin to kal main maar doonga... He turns at the door.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Agar vah zinda milla to...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kya matlab?

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Ho sakta uss raat jo goli maine usse maari ho ussi se mar gaya ho... He looks Pakhi in the eye. She doesn't flinch.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Dhanyavaad Singh sahab... Main jaakar aaraam karoon? Meri tabiyat theek nahin hai... KN Singh walks out. Pakhi comes to the door and watches him walk away down the path, very angry and very determined.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi stares at the tree. Varun enters the room, walks towards the window and sits behind her. She looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tumne mujhe bataya kyon nahin ki tumhe goli lagi huyi hai? He smiles. She doesn't say anything.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mera asli naam pata hai kya hai?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kya?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Atmanand Tripathi... He smiles. And she smiles too, for the first time in a long while. He keeps looking at her smiling. After a while her smile fades.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 105

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Hanste hue achchi lagti ho...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Vah KN Singh tumhe maar daalega...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Deb hota to pata hai kya kehte?

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kya?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Aisa koi KN Singh ya Rahman paida nahin hua jo Dev Anand ka baal bhi baanka kar sake...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tum Dev Anand nahin ho...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Vah mujhe choo bhi nahin paayega... isse bade bade chakravyuhon se nikla hoon...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Vah kal warrant le kar aa raha hai...

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Main raat ko chala jaoonga. She looks at him, then turns away to hide the coming tear

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kahaan jaaoge?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Pata nahin... Chandratal...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aur phir? Vaapas apni duniya mein?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Meri duniya to khatam ho chuki hai... koshish karoonga tumhaari duniya mein aane ki... They look at each other. She looks away.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mujhse moonh mat modo Pakhi... She doesn't look at him, walks away. He comes to her, sits in front of her.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Meri taraf dekho...  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 106 He forces her to look in his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Mujhe pata hai tumhe meri kissi baat pe vishwaas nahin hai... lekin aaj main jhoot nahin bol raha hoon... maine tumhaare aur Zamindar babu ke saath jo kiya uske liye kabhi khud ko maaf nahin kar sakta... vah hak sirf tumhaara hai... lekin main nafrat karta hoon apne aap se. Aur shayad jab tak jeeyoonga tab tak karta rahoonga... She looks at him, tears in her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Tumne kabhi mujhse pyaar kiya tha ya nahin varun?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Kiya tha, bahut kiya tha... abhi bhi karta hoon... tum ek iklauta mauka thi meri zindagi mein jeene ka jo maine gava diya... meri zindagi mein sabne mujhe istemaal kiya hai... pyaar sirf tumne kiya, izzat sirf Zamindar babu ne di... aur uski keemat nahin chuka paaya... He takes her hand in his. She doesn't protest.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Jo tum ji rahi ho yahaan vah tumhaari zindagi nahin hai... uss aakhri ek patte ke saath zindagi jodkar rakhi hai, jo sahi nahin hai... vah tumhaara tota nahin hai... She looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aur agar vah aakhri patti gir gayi to?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Nahin giregi...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Kiske liye jiyoon main?

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Apne liye... tum likhna chahti ho na... tum bahut khoobsoorat likhti ho... likho, bataao duniya ko ki kaise ehsaan faramosh log bhi hain unke beech... Tears roll out of Pakhi's eyes.  208 209 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 107

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Main akele nahin rah sakti Varun... Varun embraces her.

dialogues.speaker: VARUN
dialogues.text: Tum kabhi akele nahin rahogi... yah mera vaada hai... She tightens the embrace. They keep holding each other. Pakhi looks out of the window and see the single leaf, holding on. Music...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sitting next to her on the bed, Varun watches Pakhi sleep He gets up after a while and goes to the bathroom, leans over the sink and coughs. He holds his side, grimacing from the pain.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Varun caresses Pakhi's hair gently. She holds his hand. He smiles. The first light of morning breaks through the frosted window. Slowly, Varun disengages his hand from her grip. She sleeps on like a baby. He reaches into his pocket and takes out the photograph of them from the temple site and places it on her desk. Then he walks out of the room, watching her all the time. At the door, he takes one last look, and finally steps out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snow falls outside. Varun huddles under his jacket and steps out on the porch He looks at the tree. His POV: Completely bare. The last leaf has fallen. He smiles to himself and reaches into his jacket pocket. He takes out a painted leaf. SONG # 4 begins. INTERCUT with the police marshalling their forces for the final showdown.  Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 108 Varun walks around the house and from behind the pile of wood, he removes a wooden ladder. He carries it towards the tree. Snow begins to fall harder. Varun places the ladder against the tree trunk and slowly climbs up the tree, till he reaches a branch. He takes the painted leaf, and some string. We see other, older pieces of string on the tree. Varun starts to tie the painted leaf around the branch of the tree. The snow falls harder, the wind gets stronger. The leaf flutters and flies off. Varun reaches his hand out and grabs the leaf. The ladder falls away. He hangs onto the brach with one hand, slamming into the tree trun He wants to shout out in pain, but can't. Blood falls on the snow. The police gather at the end of the lane, led by KN Singh With a mighty pull, Varun climbs onto the trunk of the tree and reaches further onto the branch. He reaches further onto the branch. The wood digs into his side. He grimaces in pain but doesn't stop. Blood seeps all the way out to his jacket. He ties the leaf around the branch with his last bit of strength, then lets go. He falls to the ground, hitting the snow, injuring himsel even more. The wind swirls, the snow falls. But the leaf hangs on. Varun gets up looks at the tree, then notices a very weak and watery sun on the horizon, the first time we've seen it in a while. He smiles and starts walking out of the gate. He walks on the forest path, bent over in pain. He looks up, and sees the police at the end of the lane, guns pointing towards him. He keeps walking, looking them in the eye. Then takes out the gun he has, holds it in his hand. KN Singh taps a policeman on the shoulder. He fires. Varun takes a bullet in the chest. Slumps to his knees. His breath comes out in spurts, frosted.  210 211 212 213 214 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 109 After a while, he slumps to the ground. His breath stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun breaks through the clouds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi wakes up. She walks through the house, looking for Varun, knowing that he won't be there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KN Singh comes to Varun's dead body, looks at it. He picks up Varun's gun and looks through it. It's empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi walks to the window and wipes the frost off the pane, keeps looking in amazement and smiles. The single leaf flutters in the sunlight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi walks out on the porch, sees the sunlight melting the snow. She takes a deep breath, walks towards the tree. She stands under the tree and looks at the leaf. And keeps looking. It's then she notices that the leaf is painted. KN Singh comes up behind her.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Ms. Roychowdhury... Pakhi turns to him, tears in her eyes, smiling.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Vah bhaag gaya Singh sahab... KN Singh looks at her smiling face and slowly nods.

dialogues.speaker: KN SINGH
dialogues.text: Mujhe pata hai... She smiles wider and then looks back at the tree.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Aapko pata hai... vah painter banna chahta tha... aur usse pattiyan banana bhi nahin aata tha... He looks at her. 210 211 212 213 214  215 216 217 Lootera Shooting Draft vl Pg 110

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Usne aakhirkaar apna masterpiece bana hi diya... The painted leaf flutters. She keeps looking at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi writes on sheets of paper, furiously. Shyama enters, sees Pakhi writing. She's about to go into the kitchen.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: (without stopping) Shyama...

dialogues.speaker: SHYAMA
dialogues.text: Hahn didi...

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI
dialogues.text: Bhook lagi hai... Shyama tries not to cry, runs into the kitchen. Pakhi writes on.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Pata nahin vah kahaan chala gaya tha...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pakhi walks towards a beautiful blue lake, surrounded by mountains.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Pata nahin vah yahaan Chandratal pe kab aayega... lekin mujhe pata hai... She sits at the edge of the lake, looks around.

dialogues.speaker: PAKHI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Ek din vah aayega, aur hum zaroor milenge... kyonki main yahaan baithi uska intezaar kar rahi hoon... ON her face, her hair tousled by the breeze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tree in full bloom. Green grass all around. The sun shining bright. And nestled among the green leaves, one painted leaf...
